GSP33samkaubh_u:8: oṃ namo bhagavate vaivasvatāya mṛtyave brahmavidyācāryāya naciketase ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:9: atha kāṭhakopaniṣadvallīnāṃ sukhārthaprabodhanārtham alpagranthā vṛttir ārabhyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:10: sader dhātor viśaraṇagatyavasād anārthasyopanipūrvasya kvippratyayāntasya rūpam idam upaniṣad iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:12: kena punar arthayogenopaniṣacchabdena vidyocyata ity ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:13: ye mumukṣavo dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayavitṛṣṇāḥ santa upaniṣacchabdavācyāṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:14: vidyām upasadyopagamya tanniṣṭhatayā niścayena śīlayanti teṣām avidyādeḥ saṃsārabijasya
GSP33samkaubh_u:15: viśaraṇād dhiṃsanād vināśanād ity anenārthayogena vidyopaniṣad ity ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:16: tathā ca vakṣyati “nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhāt pramucyate” (KaU 3.15) iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:17: pūrvoktaviśeṣaṇān vā mumukṣūn paraṃ brahma gamayatīti brahmagamayitṛtvena yogād brahmavidyopaniṣat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:18: tathā ca vakṣyati “brahmaprāpto virajo 'bhūd vimṛtyuḥ” (KaU 3.18) iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:19: lokādir brahmajajño yo 'gnis tadviṣayāyā vidyāyā dvitīyena vareṇa prārthyamānāyāḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:21: pravṛttasyāvasādayitṛtvena śaithilyāpādanena dhātvarthayogād agnividyāpy upaniṣad ity ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:22: tathā ca vakṣyati “svargalokā amṛtatvaṃ bhajante” (KaU 1.13) ity ādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:24: upaniṣadam adhīmaha upaniṣadam adhyāpayāma iti ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:26: avidyādisaṃsārahetuviśaraṇādeḥ sadi dhātvarthasya granthamātre 'sambhavād vidyāyāṃ ca sambhavāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:27: granthasyāpi tādarthyena tacchabdatvopapatter āyur vai dhṛtam ity ādivat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:31: viṣayaś ca viśiṣṭa ukto vidyāyāḥ paraṃ brahma pratyagātmabhūtam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:32: prayojanaṃ cāsyā upaniṣada ātyantikī saṃsāranivṛttir brahmaprāptilakṣaṇā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:34: ato yathoktādhikāriviṣayaprayojanasambandhāyā vidyāyāḥ karatalanyastāmalakavat prakāśakatvena viśiṣṭādhikāriviṣayaprayojanasambandhā etā vallyo bhavantīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:36: uśan ha vai vājaśravasaḥ sarvavedasaṃ dadau /
GSP33samkaubh_u:37: tasya ha naciketā nāma putra āsa // KaU_1.1/1,1.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:39: uśan kāmayamāno ha vā iti vṛttārthasmaraṇārthau nipātau /
GSP33samkaubh_u:40: vājamannaṃ taddānādinimittaṃ śravo yaśo yasya sa vājaśravā,
GSP33samkaubh_u:43: sa kila viśvajitā sarvamedheneje tatphalaṃ kāmayamānaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:44: tasmin kratau sarvavedasaṃ sarvasvaṃ dhanaṃ dadau dattavān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:45: tasya yajamānasya ha naciketā nāma putraḥ kilāsa babhūva // KaUBh_1.1/1,1.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:46: taṃ ha kumāraṃ santaṃ dakṣiṇāsu nīyamānāsu śraddhāviveśa so 'manyata // KaU_1.2/1,1.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:47: taṃ ha naciketasaṃ kumāraṃ prathamavayasaṃ santam aprāptajananaśaktiṃ bālam eva śraddhāstikyabuddhiḥ pitur hitakāmaprayuktaviveśa praviṣṭavatī
GSP33samkaubh_u:48: kasmin kāla ity āha -- ṛtvigbhyaḥ sadasyebhyaś ca dakṣiṇāsu nīyamānāsu vibhāgenopanīyamānāsu dakṣiṇārthāsu goṣu,
GSP33samkaubh_u:51: anandā nāma te lokāstānsa gacchati tā dadat // KaU_1.3/1,1.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:52: katham ity ucyate -- pītodakā ity ādinā dakṣiṇārthā gāvo viśeṣyante /
GSP33samkaubh_u:54: jagdhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tṛṇaṃ yābhis tā jagdhatṛṇāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:55: dugdho dohaḥ kṣīrākhyo yāsāṃ tā dugdhadohāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:56: nirindriyā prajananāsamarthā jīrṇā niṣphalā gāva ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:57: yās tā evambhūtā gā ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇābuddhyā dadatprayacchannanandā anānandā asukhā nāmety etad ye te lokās tān sa yajamāno gacchati // KaUBh_1.3/1,1.3
GSP33samkaubh_u:58: sa hovāca pitaraṃ tata kasmai māṃ dāsyasīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:59: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ taṃ hovāca mṛtyave tvā dadāmīti // KaU_1.4/1,1.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:60: tad evaṃ kratvasampattinimittaṃ pitur aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ mayā putreṇa satā nivāraṇīyam
GSP33samkaubh_u:61: ātmapradānenāpi kratusampattiṃ kṛtvā ity evaṃ matvā pitaram upagamya sa hovāca pitaram
GSP33samkaubh_u:62: -- he tata tāta kasmā ṛtvigviśeṣāya dakṣiṇārthaṃ māṃ dāsyasīti prayacchasīty etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:63: evam uktena pitropekṣyamāṇo 'pi dvitīyaṃ tṛtiyam apy uvāca kasmai māṃ dāsyasi kasmai māṃ dāsyasīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:64: nāyaṃ kumārasvabhāva iti kruddhaḥ san pitā taṃ ha putraṃ kilovāca mṛtyave vaivasvatāya tvā tvāṃ dadāmīti // KaUBh_1.4/1,1.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:65: bahūnām emi prathamo bahūnām emi madhyamaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:66: kiṃ svid yamasya kartavyaṃ yan mayādya kariṣyati // KaU_1.5/1,1.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:67: sa evam uktaḥ putra ekānte paridevayāñ cakāra /
GSP33samkaubh_u:68: katham ity ucyate -- bahūnāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ vā emi gacchāmi prathamaḥ sanmukhyayā śiṣyādivṛttyety arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:69: madhyamānāṃ ca bahūnāṃ madhyamo madhyamayaiva vṛttyaimi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:71: tam evaṃ viśiṣṭaguṇam api putraṃ māṃ “mṛtyave tvā dadāmi” (KaU 1.4)
GSP33samkaubh_u:73: sa kiṃ svid yamasya kartavyaṃ prayojanaṃ mayā prattena kariṣyati yatkartavyam adya?
GSP33samkaubh_u:74: nūnaṃ prayojanam anapekṣyaiva krodhavaśād uktavān pitā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:75: tathāpi tatpitur vaco mṛṣā mā bhūditi // KaUBh_1.5/1,1.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:76: evaṃ matvā paridevanāpūrvakam āha pitaraṃ śokāviṣṭa kiṃ vā mayoktam iti --
GSP33samkaubh_u:78: sasyam iva martyaḥ pacyate sasyam ivājāyate punaḥ // KaU_1.6/1,1.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:79: anupaśyālocaya vibhāvayānukrameṇa yathā yena prakāreṇa vṛtāḥ pūrve 'tikrāntāḥ pitṛpitāmahādayas tava /
GSP33samkaubh_u:80: tān dṛṣṭrvā ca teṣāṃ vṛttam āsthātum arhasi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:81: vartamānāś cāpare sādhavo yathā vartante tāṃś ca tathā pratipaśyālocaya /
GSP33samkaubh_u:82: na ca teṣāṃ mṛṣākaraṇaṃ vṛttaṃ vartamānaṃ vāsti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:84: na ca mṛṣābhūtaṃ kṛtvā kaścid ajarāmaro bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:85: yataḥ sasyam iva martyo manuṣyaḥ pacyate jīrṇo mriyate,
GSP33samkaubh_u:86: mṛtvā ca sasyam ivājāyata āvirbhavati punar evam anitye jīvaloke kiṃ mṛṣākaraṇena /
GSP33samkaubh_u:90: tasyaitāṃ śāntiṃ kurvanti hara vaivasvatodakam // KaU_1.7/1,1.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:91: sa evam uktaḥ pitātmanaḥ satyatāyai preṣayāmāsa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:92: sa ca yamabhavanaṃ gatvā tistro rātrīr uvāsa yame proṣite /
GSP33samkaubh_u:93: proṣyāgataṃ yamam amātyā bhāryā vā ūcur bodhayanto vaiśvānaro 'gnir eva sākṣāt praviśaty atithiḥ san brāhmaṇo gṛhān dahann iva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:94: tasya dāhaṃ śamayanta ivāgner etāṃ pādyāsanādidānalakṣaṇāṃ śāntiṃ kurvanti santo 'tither yataḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:95: ato harāhara he vaivasvatodakaṃ naciketase pādyārtham /
GSP33samkaubh_u:97: āśāpratīkṣe saṃgataṃ sūnṛtāṃ ca iṣṭāpūrte putrapaśūṃś ca sarvān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:98: etad vṛṅkte puruṣasyālpamedhaso yasyānaśnan vasati brāhmaṇo gṛhe // KaU_1.8/1,1.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:103: sūnṛtāṃ ca sūnṛtā hi priyā vāktannimittajaṃ ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:106: putrapaśūṃś ca putrāṃś ca sarvān etat sarvaṃ yathoktaṃ vṛṅkte varjayati vināśayatīty etat,
GSP33samkaubh_u:109: tasmād anupekṣaṇīyaḥ sarvāvasthāsv apy atithir ity arthaḥ // KaUBh_1.8/1,1.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:110: tisro rātrīr yad avatsīr gṛhe me anaśnan brahmann atithir namasyaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:111: namas te 'stu brahman svasti me 'stu tasmāt prati trīn varān vṛṇīṣva // KaU_1.9/1,1.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:112: evam ukto mṛtyur uvāca naciketasam upagamya pūjāpuraḥsaram /
GSP33samkaubh_u:113: tistro rātrīr yad yasmād avātsīr uṣitavānasi gṛhe me mamānaśnan he brahmann atithiḥ san namasyo namaskārārhaś ca,
GSP33samkaubh_u:117: tatprāptyupaśamena yady api bhavad anugraheṇa sarvaṃ mama svasti syāt tathāpi tvadadhikasamprasādanārtham
GSP33samkaubh_u:118: anaśanenoṣitām ekaikāṃ rātriṃ prati trīn varān vṛṇīṣv ābhipretārthaviśeṣān prārthayasva
GSP33samkaubh_u:120: śāntasaṅkalpaḥ sumanā yathā syād vītamanyur gautamo mābhi mṛtyo /
GSP33samkaubh_u:121: tvatprasṛṣṭaṃ mābhivadet pratīta etat trayāṇāṃ prathamaṃ varaṃ vṛṇe // KaU_1.10/1,1.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:122: naciketās tv āha -- yadi ditsur varān śāntasaṅkalpa upaśāntaḥ saṅkalpo yasya māṃ prati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:123: yamaṃ prāpya kin nu kariṣyati mama putra iti,
GSP33samkaubh_u:124: sa śāntasaṅkalpaḥ sumanāḥ prasannamanāś ca yathā syād vītamanyur vigataroṣaś ca gautamo mama pitā mābhi māṃ prati he mṛtyo,
GSP33samkaubh_u:125: kiñ ca tvatprasṛṣṭaṃ tvayā vinirmuktaṃ preṣitaṃ gṛhaṃ prati mām abhivadet pratīto labdhasmṛtiḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:126: sa evāyaṃ putro mamāgata ity evaṃ pratyabhijānann ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:127: etat prayojanaṃ trayāṇāṃ varāṇāṃ prathamam ādyaṃ varaṃ vṛṇe prārthaye yatpituḥ paritoṣaṇam // KaUBh_1.10/1,1.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:128: yathā purastād bhavitā pratīta auddālakir āruṇir matprasṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:129: sukhaṃ rātrīḥ śayitā vītamanyus tvāṃ dadṛśivān mṛtyumukhāt pramuktam // KaU_1.11/1,1.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:130: mṛtyur uvāca -- yathā buddhis tvayi purastāt pūrvam āsīt snehasamanvitā pitus tava
GSP33samkaubh_u:131: bhavitā prītisamanvitas tava pitā tathaiva pratītaḥ pratītavān sann auddālakir uddālaka evauddālakiḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:132: aruṇasyāpatyam āruṇir dvyāmuṣyāyaṇo vā matprasṛṣṭo mayānujñātaḥ sann uttarā api rātrīḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:133: sukhaṃ prasannamanāḥ śayitā svaptā vītamanyur vigatamanyuś ca bhavati syāt tvāṃ putraṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:134: dadṛśivān dṛṣṭavān san mṛtyumukhān mṛtyugocarāt pramuktaṃ santam // KaUBh_1.11/1,1.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:135: svarge loke na bhayaṃ kiṃcanāsti na tatra tvaṃ na jarayā bibheti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:136: ubhe tīrtvā aśanāyāpipāse śokātigo modate svargaloke // KaU_1.12/1,1.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:137: naciketā uvāca -- svarge loke rogādinimittaṃ bhayaṃ kiñcana kiñcid api nāsti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:138: na ca tatra tvaṃ mṛtyo sahasā prabhavasi,
GSP33samkaubh_u:139: ato jarayā yukta iha lokavat tvatto na bibheti kaścit tatra /
GSP33samkaubh_u:140: kiñcobha aśanāyāpipāse tīrtvātikramya śokam atītya gacchatīti śokātigaḥ san mānasena duḥkhena varjito modate hṛṣyati svargaloke divye // KaUBh_1.12/1,1.12
GSP33samkaubh_u:141: sa tvam agniṃ svargyam adhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya mahyam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:142: svargalokā amṛtatvaṃ bhajanta etad dvitīyena vṛṇe vareṇa // KaU_1.13/1,1.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:143: evaṅ guṇaviśiṣṭasya svargalokasya prāptisādhanabhūtaṃ svargyam agniṃ sa tvaṃ mṛtyur adhyeṣi smarasi jānāsīty arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:144: he mṛtyo yatas taṃ prabrūhi kathaya śraddadhānāya śraddhāvate mahyaṃ svargārthine /
GSP33samkaubh_u:145: yenāgninā citena svargalokaḥ svargo loko yeṣāṃ te svargalokā yajamānā amṛtatvam amaraṇatāṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:146: devatvaṃ bhajante prāpnuvanti tad etad agnivijñānaṃ dvitīyena vareṇa vṛṇe // KaUBh_1.13/1,1.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:147: pra te bravīmi tad u me nibodha svargyam agniṃ naciketaḥ prajānan /
GSP33samkaubh_u:148: anantalokāptim atho pratiṣṭhāṃ viddhi tvam etaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyām // KaU_1.14/1,1.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:149: mṛtyoḥ pratijñā iyam -- pra te tubhyaṃ prabravīmi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:150: yat tvayā prārthitaṃ tadu me mama vacaso nibodha budhyasvaikāgramanāḥ san svargyaṃ svargāya hitaṃ svargasādhanam agniṃ he naciketaḥ prajānan vijñātavān sann aham ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:151: prabravīmi tan nibodheti ca śiṣyabuddhisamādhānārthaṃ vacanam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:152: adhunāgniṃ stauti -- anantaṃ lokāpti svargalokaphalaprāptisādhanam ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:153: atho 'pi pratiṣṭhām āśrayaṃ jagato virāḍrūpeṇa tam etam agniṃ mayocyamānaṃ viddhi vijānīhi tvaṃ nihitaṃ sthitaṃ guhāyāṃ viduṣāṃ buddhau niviṣṭam ity arthaḥ // KaUBh_1.14/1,1.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:154: lokādim agniṃ tam uvāca tasmai yā iṣṭakā yāvatīr vā yathā vā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:155: sa cāpi tat pratyavadad yathoktam athāsya mṛtyuḥ punar āha tuṣṭaḥ // KaU_1.15/1,1.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:157: lokādiṃ lokānām ādiṃ pratham aśarīritvād agniṃ taṃ prakṛtaṃ naciketasā prārthitam uvācoktavān mṛtyus tasmai naciketase /
GSP33samkaubh_u:158: kiñ ca yā iṣṭakāś cetavyāḥ svarūpeṇa,
GSP33samkaubh_u:160: yathā vā ciyate 'gnir yena prakāreṇa sarvam etad uktavān ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:161: sa cāpi naciketās tan mṛtyunoktaṃ pratyavadad yathāvat pratyayenāvadat pratyuccāritavān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:162: athāsya pratyuccāraṇena tuṣṭaḥ san mṛtyuḥ punar evāha varatrayavyatirekeṇānyaṃ varaṃ ditsuḥ // KaUBh_1.15/1,1.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:163: tam abravīt prīyamāṇo mahātmā varaṃ tavehādya dadāmi bhūyaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:164: tavaiva nāmnā bhavitāyam agniḥ sṛṅkāṃ cemām anekarūpāṃ gṛhāṇa // KaU_1.16/1,1.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:165: kathaṃ taṃ naciketasam abravīt prīyamāṇaḥ śiṣyasya yogyatāṃ paśyan prīyamāṇaḥ prītim
GSP33samkaubh_u:166: anubhavan mahātmākṣudrabuddhir varaṃ tava caturtham iha prītinimittam adyedānīṃ dadāmi
GSP33samkaubh_u:168: tavaiva naciketaso nāmnābhidhānena prasiddho bhavitā mayocyamāno 'yam agniḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:169: kiñ ca sṛṅkāṃ śabdavatīṃ ratnamayīṃ mālām imām anekarūpāṃ vicitrāṃ gṛhāṇa svīkuru /
GSP33samkaubh_u:170: yad vā, sṛṅkām akutsitāṃ gatiṃ karmamayīṃ gṛhāṇa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:171: anyad api karmavijñānam anekaphalahetutvāt svīkurvity arthaḥ // KaUBh_1.16/1,1.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:173: triṇāciketas tribhir etya sandhiṃ trikarmakṛt tarati janmamṛtyū /
GSP33samkaubh_u:174: brahmajajñaṃ devam īḍyaṃ viditvā nicāyyemāṃ śāntim atyantam eti // KaU_1.17/1,1.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:175: triṇāciketas triḥkṛtvā nāciketo 'gniś cito yena sa triṇāciketas tadvijñānatadadhyayanatadanuṣṭhānavān vā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:176: tribhir mātṛpitrācāryair etya prāpya sandhiṃ sandhānaṃ sambandhaṃ mātrādyanuśāsanaṃ yathāvat prāpyety etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:177: tad dhi prāmāṇyakāraṇaṃ śrutyantarād avagamyate “yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān” (BĀU 4,1.2) ity ādeḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:180: trikarmakṛt ijyādhyayanadānānāṃ kartā taraty atikrāmati janmamṛtyū /
GSP33samkaubh_u:181: kiñ ca brahmajajñaṃ brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhāj jāto brahmajaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:182: brahmajaś cāsau jñaś ceti brahmajajñaḥ sarvajño hy asau /
GSP33samkaubh_u:183: taṃ devaṃ dyotanāñ jñānādiguṇavantam īḍyaṃ stutyaṃ viditvā śāstrato,
GSP33samkaubh_u:184: nicāyya dṛṣṭvā cātmabhāvenemāṃ svabuddhipratyakṣāṃ śāntim uparatim atyantam ety atiśayenaiti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:185: vairājaṃ padaṃ jñānakarmasamuccayānuṣṭhānena prāpnotīty arthaḥ // KaUBh_1.17/1,1.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:187: triṇāciketas trayam etad viditvā ya evaṃ vidvāṃś cinute nāciketam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:188: sa mṛtyupāśān purataḥ praṇodya śokātigo modate svargaloke // KaU_1.18/1,1.18 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:189: triṇāciketas trayaṃ yathoktaṃ “yā iṣṭakā yāvatīrvā yathā vā” (KaU 1.15)
GSP33samkaubh_u:190: ity etad viditvāvagamya yaś caivam ātmarūpeṇāgniṃ vidvāṃś cinute nirvartayati nāciketam
GSP33samkaubh_u:191: agniṃ kratuṃ sa mṛtyupāśān adharmājñānarāgadveṣādilakṣaṇān purato 'grataḥ pūrvam
GSP33samkaubh_u:192: eva śarīrapātād ity arthaḥ praṇodyāpahāya śokātigo mānasair duḥkhair varjita ity
GSP33samkaubh_u:193: etan modate svargaloke vairāje virāḍātmasvarūpapratipattyā // KaUBh_1.18/1,1.18 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:194: eṣa te 'gnir naciketaḥ svargyo yam avṛṇīthā dvitīyena vareṇa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:195: etam agniṃ tavaiva pravakṣyanti janāsas tṛtīyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva // KaU_1.19/1,1.19 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:196: eṣa te tubhyam agnir varo he naciketaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:197: svargyaḥ svargasādhano yam agniṃ varam avṛṇīthāḥ prārthitavānasi dvitīyena vareṇa,
GSP33samkaubh_u:199: kiñ caitam agniṃ tavaiva nāmnā pravakṣyanti janāso janā ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:200: eṣa varo datto mayā caturthas tuṣṭena /
GSP33samkaubh_u:202: tasmin hy adatta ṛṇavān evāham ity ābhiprāyaḥ // KaUBh_1.19/1,1.19 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:203: etāvad dhy atikrāntena vidhipratiṣedhārthena mantrabrāhmaṇenāvagantavyaṃ yadvaradvayasūcitaṃ vastu nātmatattvaviṣayayāthātmyavijñānam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:206: ātyantikaniḥśreyasaprayojanaṃ vaktavyam ity uttaro grantha ārabhyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:207: tam etam arthaṃ dvitīyavaraprāptyāpy akṛtārthatvaṃ tṛtīyavaragocaram ātmajñānam antareṇa ity ākhyāyikayā prapañcayati --
GSP33samkaubh_u:208: yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye astīty eke nāyam astīti caike /
GSP33samkaubh_u:209: etad vidyām anuśiṣṭas tvayāhaṃ varāṇām eṣa varas tṛtīyaḥ // KaU_1.20/1,1.20 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:210: yataḥ pūrvasmāt karmagocarāt sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇād anityād viraktasyātmajñāne 'dhikāra iti tannindārtha putrādyupanyāsena pralobhanaṃ kriyate
GSP33samkaubh_u:212: ity uktaḥ san -- yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ prete mṛte manuṣye,
GSP33samkaubh_u:213: astīty eke 'sti śarīrendriyamanobuddhivyatirikto dehāntarasambandhyātmety eke manyante,
GSP33samkaubh_u:216: ataś cāsmākaṃ na pratyakṣeṇa nāpi vānumānena nirṇayavijñānam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:217: etad vijñānādhīno hi paraḥ puruṣārtha ity ata etad vidyāṃ vijānīyām aham anuśiṣṭo jñāpitas tvayā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:219: kim ayam ekāntato niḥśreyasasādhanātmajñānārho na vety etat parīkṣaṇārtham āha --
GSP33samkaubh_u:220: devair atrāpi vicikitsitaṃ purā na hi sujñeyam aṇur eṣa dharmaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:221: anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva mā moparotsīr ati mā sṛjainam // KaU_1.21/1,1.21 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:222: devair apy atraitasmin vastuni vicikitsitaṃ saṃśayitaṃ purā pūrvam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:223: na hi suvijñeyaṃ suṣṭhu jñeyam asakṛt śrutam api prākṛtair janair yato 'ṇuḥ sūkṣma eṣa ātmākhyo dharmaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:224: ato 'nyam asan digdhaphalaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva,
GSP33samkaubh_u:225: mā moparotsīr uparodhaṃ mā kārṣīr adharmaṇam ivottamarṇaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:226: atisṛja vimuñcainaṃ varaṃ mā māṃ prati // KaUBh_1.21/1,1.21 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:228: devair atrāpi vicikitsitaṃ kila tvaṃ ca mṛtyo yan na sujñeyam āttha /
GSP33samkaubh_u:229: vaktā cāsya tvādṛg anyo na labhyo nānyo varas tulya etasya kaścit // KaU_1.22/1,1.22 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:230: devair atrāpy etasmin vastuni vicikitsitaṃ kileti bhavata eva naḥ śrutam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:231: tvaṃ ca mṛtyo yady asmān na sujñeyam ātmatattvam āttha kathayasi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:232: ataḥ paṇḍitair apy avadanīyatvād vaktā cāsya dharmasya tvādṛk tvattulyo 'nyaḥ paṇḍitaś ca na labhyo 'nviṣyamāṇo 'py ayaṃ tu varo niḥśreyasaprāptihetuḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:233: ato nānyo varas tulyaḥ sadṛśo 'sty etasya kaścid apy,
GSP33samkaubh_u:235: evam ukto 'pi punaḥ pralobhayann uvāca mṛtyuḥ --
GSP33samkaubh_u:236: śatāyuṣaḥ putrapautrān vṛṇīṣva bahūn paśūn hastihiraṇyam aśvān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:237: bhūmer mahad āyatanaṃ vṛṇīṣva svayaṃ ca jīva śarado yāvad icchasi // KaU_1.23/1,1.23 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:238: śatāyuṣaḥ śataṃ varṣāṇy āyūṃṣi yeṣāṃ tān śatāyuṣaḥ putrapautrān vṛṇīṣva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:240: hastihiraṇyaṃ hastī ca hiraṇyaṃ ca hastihiraṇyam, aśvāṃś ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:241: kiñ ca bhūmeḥ pṛthivyā mahad vistīrṇam āyatanam āśrayaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sāmrājyaṃ vṛṇīṣva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:242: kiñ ca sarvam apy etad anarthakaṃ svayaṃ ced alpāyur ity ata āha -- svayaṃ ca tvaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:243: jīva dhāraya śarīraṃ samagrendriyakalāpaṃ śarado varṣāṇi yāvad icchasi jīvitum //
GSP33samkaubh_u:244: etat tulyaṃ yadi manyase varaṃ vṛṇīṣva vittaṃ cirajīvikāṃ ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:245: mahābhūmau naciketas tvam edhi kāmānāṃ tvā kāmabhājaṃ karomi // KaU_1.24/1,1.24 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:246: etat tulyam etena yathopadiṣṭena sadṛśamanyam api yadi manyase varaṃ tam api vṛṇīṣva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:247: kiñ ca vittaṃ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyaratnādi cirajīvikāṃ ca saha vittena vṛṇīṣvety etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:248: kiṃ bahunā, mahābhūmau mahatyāṃ bhūmau rājā naciketas tvam edhi bhava /
GSP33samkaubh_u:249: kiñ cānyat kāmānāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca tvā tvāṃ kāmabhājaṃ kāmabhāginaṃ kāmārhaṃ karomi,
GSP33samkaubh_u:251: ye ye kāmā durlabhā martyaloke sarvān kāmāṃś chandataḥ prārthayasva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:252: imā rāmāḥ sarathāḥ satūryā na hīdṛśā lambhanīyā manuṣyaiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:253: ābhir matprattābhiḥ paricārayasva naciketo maraṇaṃ mānuprākṣīḥ // KaU_1.25/1,1.25 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:254: ye ye kāmāḥ prārthanīyā durlabhāś ca matryaloke sarvās tān kāmāñ chandata icchātaḥ prārthayasva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:259: tāś ca na hi lambhanīyāḥ prāpaṇīyā īdṛśā evaṃvidhā manuṣyair matyair asmadādiprasādam antareṇa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:260: ābhir matprattābhir mayā pradattābhiḥ paricāriṇībhiḥ paricārayasvātmānam,
GSP33samkaubh_u:262: naciketo, maraṇaṃ maraṇasambaddhaṃ praśnaṃ prete 'sti nāstīti kākadantaparīkṣārūpaṃ mānuprākṣīr maivaṃ praṣṭum arhasi // KaUBh_1.25/1,1.25 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:264: śvobhāvā martyasya yad antakaitat sarvendriyāṇāṃ jarayanti tejaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:265: api sarvaṃ jīvitam alpam eva tavaiva vāhās tava nṛtyagīte // KaU_1.26/1,1.26 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:266: śvo bhaviṣyanti na bhaviṣyanti veti sandihyamāna eva yeṣāṃ bhāvo bhavanaṃ tvayopanyastānāṃ bhogānāṃ te śvobhāvāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:267: kiñ ca matryasya manuṣyasyāntaka he mṛtyo,
GSP33samkaubh_u:268: yad etat sarvendriyāṇāṃ tejas taj jarayanty apakṣayanty apsaraḥprabhṛtayo bhogā anarthāyaivate dharmavīryaprajñātejoyaśaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ kṣapayitṛtvāt
GSP33samkaubh_u:269: yāṃ cāpi dīrghajīvikāṃ tvaṃ ditsasi tatrāpi śṛṇu /
GSP33samkaubh_u:270: sarvaṃ yad brahmaṇo 'pi jīvitam āyur alpam eva,
GSP33samkaubh_u:272: atas tavaiva tiṣṭhantu vāhā rathādayas tathā tava nṛtyagīte ca // KaUBh_1.26/1,1.26 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:273: na vittena tarpaṇīyo manuṣyo lapsyāmahe vittam adrākṣma cet tvā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:274: jīviṣyāmo yāvad īśiṣyasi tvaṃ varas tu me varaṇīyaḥ sa eva // KaU_1.27/1,1.27 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:275: kiñ ca na prabhūtena vittena tarpaṇīyo manuṣyaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:276: na hi loke vittalābhaḥ kasyacit tṛptikaro dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:277: yadi nāmāsmākaṃ vittatṛṣṇā syāl lapsyāmahe prāpsyāmahe vittam adrākṣma dṛṣṭavanto vayaṃ cet tvā tvām /
GSP33samkaubh_u:279: jīviṣyāmo yāvad yāmye pade tvam īśiṣyasīśiṣyase prabhuḥ syāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:280: kathaṃ hi martyas tvayā sametyālpadhanāyur bhavet /
GSP33samkaubh_u:281: varas tu me varaṇīyaḥ sa eva yadātmavijñānam // KaUBh_1.27/1,1.27 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:282: ajīryatām amṛtānām upetya jīryan martyaḥ kvadhaḥsthaḥ prajānan /
GSP33samkaubh_u:283: abhidhyāyan varṇaratipramodān atidīrghe jīvite ko rameta // KaU_1.28/1,1.28 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:284: yataś cājīryatāṃ vayohāṇim aprāpnuvatām amṛtānāṃ sakāśam upetyopagamyātmana utkṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:285: prayojanāntaraṃ prāptavyaṃ tebhyaḥ prajānann upalabhamānaḥ svayaṃ tu jīryan martyo
GSP33samkaubh_u:286: jarāmaraṇavān kvadhaḥsthaḥ kuḥ pṛthivy adhaś cāsāv āntarikṣādilokāpekṣayā tasyāṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:287: tiṣṭhatīti kvadhaḥsthaḥ san katham evam avivekibhiḥ prārthanīyaṃ putravittādyasthiraṃ vṛṇīte /
GSP33samkaubh_u:289: asmin pakṣe caivam akṣarayojanā teṣu putrādiṣv āsthā sthitis tātparyeṇa vartanaṃ yasya sa tadāsthaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:290: tato 'dhikataraṃ puruṣārthaṃ duṣprāpam api prāpipayiṣuḥ kva tadāstho bhavet ?
GSP33samkaubh_u:291: na kaścit tadasārajñas tadarthī syād ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:292: sarvo hy uparyuparyeva bubhūṣati lokas tasmān na putravittādilobhaiḥ pralobhyo 'ham /
GSP33samkaubh_u:293: kiñ cāpsaraḥ pramukhān varṇaratipramodānanavasthitarūpatayābhidhyāyannirūpayanyathāvad atidīrghe jīvite ko vivekī rameta // KaUBh_1.28/1,1.28
GSP33samkaubh_u:294: yasminn idaṃ vicikitsanti mṛtyo yat sāmparāye mahati brūhi nas tat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:295: yo 'yaṃ varo gūḍham anupraviṣṭo nānyaṃ tasmān naciketā vṛṇīte // KaU_1.29/1,1.29 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:297: ato vihāyānityaiḥ kāmaiḥ pralobhanaṃ yanmayā prārthitaṃ yasmin preta idaṃ vicikitsanaṃ vicikitsanty asti nāstīty evaṃ prakāram,
GSP33samkaubh_u:299: sāmparāye paralokaviṣaye mahati mahatprayojananimitta ātmano nirṇayavijñānaṃ yat tad brūhi kathaya no 'smabhyam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:301: yo 'yaṃ prakṛta ātmaviṣayo varo gūḍhaṃ gahanaṃ durvivecanaṃ prāpto 'nupraviṣṭaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:302: tasmād varād anyam avivekibhiḥ prārthanīyam anityaviṣayaṃ varaṃ naciketā na vṛṇīte manasāpīti śruter vacanam iti // KaUBh_1.29/1,1.29 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:306: anyac chreyo 'nyad utaiva preyas te ubhe nānārthe puruṣaṃ sinītaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:307: tayoḥ śreya ādadānasya sādhu bhavati hīyate 'rthād ya u preyo vṛṇīte // KaU_2.1/1,2.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:308: anyat pṛthag eva śreyo niḥśreyasaṃ tathānyad utaivāpi ca preyaḥ priyataram api te
GSP33samkaubh_u:309: preyaḥ śreyasy ubhe nānārthe bhinnaprayojane satī puruṣam adhikṛtaṃ varṇāśramādiviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:310: sinīto badhnītas tābhyāṃ vidyāvidyābhyām ātmakartavyatayā prayujyate sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:311: śreyaḥ preyasor hy abhyudayāmṛtatvārthī puruṣaḥ pravartate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:313: tābhyāṃ buddha ity ucyate sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:314: te yady apy ekaikapuruṣārthasambandhinī vidyāvidyārūpatvād viruddhe ity anyatarāparityāgenaikena puruṣena sahānuṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt tayor hitvāvidyārūpaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:315: śreya eva kevalam ādadānasyopādānaṃ kurvataḥ sādhu śobhanaṃ śivaṃ bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:316: yas tv adūradarśī vimūḍho hīyate viyujyate 'rthāt puruṣārthāt pāramārthikāt prayojanān nityāt pracyavata ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:317: ko 'sau ya u preyo vṛṇīta upādatta ity etat // KaUBh_2.1/1,2.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:318: śreyaś ca preyaś ca manuṣyam etas tau saṃparītya vivinakti dhīraḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:319: śreyo hi dhīro 'bhi preyaso vṛṇīte preyo mando yogakṣemād vṛṇīte // KaU_2.2/1,2.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:321: kim arthaṃ preya evādatte bāhulyena loka ity ucyate -- satyaṃ svāyatte,
GSP33samkaubh_u:322: tathāpi sādhanataḥ phalataś ca mandabuddhīnāṃ durvivekarūpe satī vyāmiśrībhūta iva manuṣyaṃ puruṣam etaḥ prāpnutaḥ śreyaś ca preyaś ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:324: tau śreyaḥ preyaḥ padārthau samparītya samyak parigamya manāsālocya gurulāghavaṃ vivinakti pṛthak karoti dhīro dhīmān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:325: vivicya ca śreyo hi śreya evābhivṛṇīte preyaso 'bhyarhitatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:327: yas tu mando 'lpabuddhiḥ sa sadasadvivekāsāmarthyād yogakṣemād yogakṣemanimitaṃ śarīrādyupacayarakṣaṇanimittam ity etat preyaḥ paśuputrādilakṣaṇaṃ vṛṇīte // KaUBh_2.2/1,2.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:328: sa tvaṃ priyān priyarūpāṃś ca kāmān abhidhyāyan naciketo 'tyasrākṣīḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:329: naitāṃ sṛṅkāṃ vittamayīm avāpto yasyāṃ majjanti bahavo manuṣyāḥ // KaU_2.3/1,2.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:330: sa tvaṃ punaḥ punar mayā pralobhyamāno 'pi priyān putrādīn priyarūpāṃś cāpsaraḥprabhṛtilakṣaṇān
GSP33samkaubh_u:331: kāmān abhidhyāyaṃś cintayaṃs teṣām anityatvāsāratvādidoṣān he naciketotyastrākṣīratisṛṣṭavān
GSP33samkaubh_u:333: naitām avāptavān asi sṛṅktāṃ sṛtiṃ kutsitāṃ mūḍhajanapravṛttāṃ vittamayī dhanaprāyām /
GSP33samkaubh_u:334: yasyāṃ sṛtau majjanti sīdanti bahavo 'neke mūḍhā manuṣyāḥ // KaUBh_2.3/1,2.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:335: dūram ete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyeti jñātā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:336: vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta // KaU_2.4/1,2.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:337: “tayoḥ, śreya ādadanasya sādhu bhavati hīyate 'rthādya u preyo vṛṇīte” (KaU 2.1)
GSP33samkaubh_u:339: yato dūraṃ dūreṇa mahatāntareṇaite viparīta anyonyavyāvṛttarūpe vivekāvivekātmakatvāt tamaḥprakāśāv iva viṣūcī viṣūcyau nānāgatī bhinnaphale saṃsāramokṣahetutvenety etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:340: ke ta ity ucyate -- yā cāvidyā preyoviṣayā vidyeti ca śreyoviṣayā jñātā nirjñātāvagatā paṇḍitais tatra vidyābhīpsinaṃ vidyārthinaṃ naciketasaṃ tvām ahaṃ manye /
GSP33samkaubh_u:341: kasmād yasmād avidvad buddhipralobhinaḥ kāmā apsaraḥprabhṛtayo bahavo 'pi tvā tvāṃ nālolupanta na vicchedaṃ kṛtavantaḥ śreyomārgād ātmopabhogābhivāñchāsampādanena
GSP33samkaubh_u:342: ato vidyārthinaṃ śreyobhājanaṃ manya ity abhiprāyaḥ // KaUBh_2.4/1,2.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:343: avidyāyām antare vartamānāḥ svayaṃ dhīrāḥ paṇḍitaṃ manyamānāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:344: dandramyamāṇāḥ pariyanti mūḍhā andhenaiva nīyamānā yathāndhāḥ // KaU_2.5/1,2.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:345: ye tu saṃsārabhājo janā avidyāyām antare madhye ghanībhūta iva tamasi vartamānā veṣṭyamānāḥ putrapaśvāditṛṣṇāpāśaśataiḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:346: svayaṃ dhīrāḥ prajñāvantaḥ paṇḍitāḥ śāstrakuśalaś ceti manyamānās te dandramyamāṇā
GSP33samkaubh_u:347: atyarthaṃ kuṭilām anekarūpāṃ gatiṃ gacchanto jarāmaraṇarogādiduḥkhaiḥ pariyanti parigacchanti
GSP33samkaubh_u:348: mūḍhā avivekino 'ndhenaiva dṛṣṭivihīnenaiva nīyamānā viṣame pathi yathā bahavondhā
GSP33samkaubh_u:350: na sāmparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham /
GSP33samkaubh_u:351: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punar vaśam āpadyate me // KaU_2.6/1,2.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:352: ata eva mūḍhatvān na sāmparāyaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:353: sampareyata iti sāmparāyaḥ paralokas tatprāptiprayojanaḥ sādhanaviśeṣaḥ śāstrīyaḥ sāmparāyaḥ sa ca bālam avivekinaṃ prati na pratibhāti na prakāśate nopatiṣṭhata ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:354: pramādyantaṃ pramādaṃ kurvantaṃ putrapaśvādiprayojaneṣv āsaktamanasaṃ tathā vittamohena vittanimittenāvivekena mūḍhaṃ tamasācchannam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:355: sa tv ayam eva loko yo 'yaṃ dṛśyamānaḥ stryannapānādiviśiṣṭo nāsti paro 'dṛṣṭo loka
GSP33samkaubh_u:356: ity evaṃ mananaśīlo mānī punaḥ punar janitvā vaśaṃ me 'dhīnatāmāpadyate mṛtyor mama
GSP33samkaubh_u:358: prāyeṇa hy evaṃvidha eva lokaḥ // KaUBh_2.6/1,2.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:359: śravaṇāyāpi bahubhir yo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:360: āścaryo vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ // KaU_2.7/1,2.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:361: yas tu śreyorthī sahasreṣu kaścid evātmavidbhavati tvad vidho yasmāc chravaṇāyāpi
GSP33samkaubh_u:362: śravaṇārthaṃ śrotam api yo na labhya ātmā bahubhir anekaiḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo 'neke
GSP33samkaubh_u:363: 'nye yam ātmānaṃ na vidyur na vidanty abhāgino 'saṃskṛtātmāno na vijānīyuḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:364: kiñ cāsya vaktāpy āścaryo 'dbhutavad evānekeṣu kaścid eva bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:365: tathā śrutvāpy asyātmanaḥ kuśalo nipuṇa evānekeṣu labdhā kaścid eva bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:366: yasmād āścaryo jñātā kaścid eva kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ kuśalena nipuṇenācāryeṇānuśiṣṭaḥ (saṃśikṣita ity adhyāhāryam) san // KaUBh_2.7/1,2.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:367: na nareṇāvareṇa prokta eṣa suvijñeyo bahudhā cintyamānaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:368: ananyaprokte gatir atra nāsty aṇīyān hy atarkyam aṇupramāṇāt // KaU_2.8/1,2.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:369: kasmāt ? na hi nareṇa manuṣyeṇāvareṇa prokto 'vareṇa hīnena prakṛtabuddhinety etad ukta eṣa ātmā yaṃ tvaṃ māṃ pṛcchasi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:370: na hi suṣṭhu samyag vijñeyo vijñātuṃ śakyo yasmād bahudhāsti nāsti kartākartā śuddho 'śuddha ity ādyanekadhā cintyamāno vādibhiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:371: kathaṃ punaḥ suvijñeya ity ucyate -- ananyaprokte 'nanyenāpṛthag darśinācāryeṇa pratipādyabrahmātmabhūtena
GSP33samkaubh_u:372: prokta ukta ātmani gatir anekadhāstināstīty ādilakṣaṇā cintā gatir atrāsminn ātmani
GSP33samkaubh_u:374: athavā svātmabhūte 'nanyasminn ātmani prokte 'nanyaprokte gatir atrānyāvagatir nāsti jñeyasyānyasyābhāvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:375: jñānasya hy eṣā parā niṣṭhā yad ātmaikatvavijñānam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:377: saṃsāragatir vātra nāsty ananya ātmani prokte nāntarīyakatvāt tadvijñānaphalasya mokṣasya /
GSP33samkaubh_u:378: athavā procyamānabrahmātmabhūtenācāryeṇānanyatayā prokta ātmany agatir anavabodho 'parijñānam atra nāsti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:379: bhavaty evāvagatis tadviṣayā śrotus tadananyo 'ham ity ācāryasyevety arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:381: itarathā hy aṇīyān aṇutaro 'ṇupramāṇād api sampadyata ātmā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:383: tarkyamāṇe 'ṇuparimāṇe kenacit sthāpita ātmani tato 'ṇutaram anyo 'bhyūhati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:385: iti na hi tarkasya niṣṭhā kvacid vidyate // KaUBh_2.8/1,2.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:386: naiṣā tarkeṇa matir āpaneyā proktānyenaiva sujñānāya preṣṭha /
GSP33samkaubh_u:387: yāṃ tvam āpaḥ satyadhṛtir batāsi tvādṛṅ no bhūyān naciketaḥ preṣṭā // KaU_2.9/1,2.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:388: ato 'nanyaprokta ātmany utpannā yeyam āgamapratipādyātmamatir naiṣā tarkeṇa svabuddhyābhyūhamātreṇāpaneyā na prāpaṇīyety arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:390: tārkiko hy anāgam ajñaḥ svabuddhiparikalpitaṃ yat kiñcid eva kalpayati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:391: ata eva ca yeyam āgamaprabhūtā matis tārkikād anyenaivāgamābhijñenācāryeṇaiva proktā satī sujñānāya bhavati he preṣṭha priyatama /
GSP33samkaubh_u:392: kā punaḥ sā tarkāgamyā matir ity ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:393: yāṃ tvaṃ matiṃ madvarapradānenāpaḥ prāptavān asi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:394: satyā avitathaviṣayā dhṛtir yasya tava sa tvaṃ satyadhṛtiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:395: batāsīty anukampayann āha mṛtyur naciketasaṃ vakṣyamāṇavijñānastutaye /
GSP33samkaubh_u:396: tvādṛk tv atulyo no 'smabhyaṃ bhūyād bhavatādbhavatvanyaḥ putraḥ śiṣyo vā praṣṭā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:397: kīdṛk ? yādṛktvaṃ he naciketaḥ praṣṭā // KaUBh_2.9/1,2.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:398: jānāmy ahaṃ śevadhir ity anityaṃ na hy adhruvaiḥ prāpyate hi dhruvaṃ tat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:399: tato mayā nāciketaś cito 'gnir anityair dravyaiḥ prāptavān asmi nityam // KaU_2.10/1,2.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:400: punar api tuṣṭa āha -- jānāmy ahaṃ śevadhir nidhiḥ karmaphalalakṣaṇo nidhir iva prāthyata iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:402: na hi yasmād anityair adhruvair yan nityaṃ dhruvaṃ tatprāpyate paramātmākhyaḥ śevadhiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:403: yas tv anityasukhātmakaḥ śevadhiḥ sa evānityair dravyaiḥ prāpyate hi yatas tatas
GSP33samkaubh_u:404: tasmān mayā jānatāpi nityam anityasādhanaiḥ prāpyata iti nāciketaś cito 'gnir anityair
GSP33samkaubh_u:405: dravyaiḥ paśvādibhiḥ svargasukhasādhanabhūto 'gnir nirvartita ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:406: tenāham adhikārāpanno nityaṃ yāmyaṃ sthānaṃ svargākhyaṃ nityam āpekṣikaṃ prāptavān asmi // KaUBh_2.10/1,2.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:407: kāmasya āptiṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ krator anantyam abhayasya pāram /
GSP33samkaubh_u:408: stomamahad urugāyaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛtyā dhīro naciketo 'tyasrākṣīḥ // KaU_2.11/1,2.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:415: stomaṃ ca tanmahac ca niratiśayatvāt stomamahat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:417: pratiṣṭhāṃ sthitim ātmano 'nuttamām api dṛṣṭvā dhṛtyā dhairyeṇa dhīge dhīmān san naciketo 'tyasrākṣīḥ param evākāṅkṣann atisṛṣṭvān asi sarvam etat saṃsārabhogajātam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:419: taṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍham anupraviṣṭaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:420: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti // KaU_2.12/1,2.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:421: yaṃ tvaṃ jñātum icchasy ātmānaṃ taṃ durdarśaṃ duḥkhena darśanam asyeti durdarśo 'tisūkṣmatvāt taṃ gūḍhaṃ gahanam,
GSP33samkaubh_u:425: yata evaṃ gūḍham anupraviṣṭo guhāhitaś cāto gahvareṣṭho 'to durdarśaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:426: taṃ purāṇaṃ purātanam adhyātmayogādhigamena viṣayebhyaḥ pratisaṃhṛtya cetasa ātmani
GSP33samkaubh_u:427: samādhānam adhyātmayogas tasyādhigamas tena matvā devam ātmānaṃ dhīro harṣaśokāv
GSP33samkaubh_u:429: etac chrutvā saṃparigṛhya martyaḥ pravṛhya dharmyam aṇum etam āpya /
GSP33samkaubh_u:430: sa modate modanīyaṃ hi labdhvā vivṛtaṃ sadma naciketasaṃ manye // KaU_2.13/1,2.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:431: kiñ ca, etad ātmatattvaṃ yad ahaṃ vakṣyāmi tac chutvācāryaprasādāt samyag ātmabhāvena
GSP33samkaubh_u:432: parigṛhyopādāya martyo maraṇadharmā dharmād anupetaṃ dharmyaṃ pravṛhyodyamya pṛthak
GSP33samkaubh_u:433: kṛtya śarīrāder aṇuṃ sūkṣmam etam ātmānam āpya prāpya sa martyo vidvān modate modanīyaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:435: tad etad evaṃvidhaṃ brahma sadma bhavanaṃ naciketasaṃ tvāṃ pratyapāvṛtadvāraṃ vivṛtam abhimukhībhūtaṃ manye,
GSP33samkaubh_u:436: mokṣārhaṃ tvāṃ manya ity abhiprāyaḥ // KaUBh_2.13/1,2.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:438: anyatra bhūtāc ca bhavyāc ca yat tat paśyasi tad vada // KaU_2.14/1,2.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:439: etac chrutvā naciketāḥ punar āha -- yady ahaṃ yogyaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:441: anyatra dharmāc chāstrīyād dharmānuṣṭhānāt tatphalāt tatkārakebhyaś ca pṛthag bhūtam ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:444: kṛtaṃ kāryam akṛtaṃ kāraṇam asmād anyatra /
GSP33samkaubh_u:445: kiñ cānyatra bhūtāc cātikrāntāt kālād bhavyāc ca bhaviṣyataś ca tathā vartamānāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:446: kālatrayeṇa yan na paricchidyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:447: yad īdṛśaṃ vastu sarvavyavahāragocarātītaṃ paśyasi jānāsi tadvada mahyam // KaUBh_2.14/1,2.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:448: sarve vedā yat padam āmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yad vadanti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:449: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om ity etat // KaU_2.15/1,2.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:450: ity evaṃ pṛṣṭavate mṛtyur uvāca pṛṣṭaṃ vastu viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ ca vivakṣan -- sarve vedā yat padaṃ padanīyaṃ gamanīyam avibhāgenāvirodhenāmananti
GSP33samkaubh_u:451: tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yad vadanti yat prāptyarthānīty arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:452: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ gurukulavāsalakṣaṇam anyad vā brahmaprāptyarthaṃ caranti,
GSP33samkaubh_u:453: tat te tubhyaṃ padaṃ yaj jñātum icchasi saṅgraheṇa saṅkṣepato bravīmi, om ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:454: tad etat padaṃ yad bubhutsitaṃ tvayā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:455: yad etad om ity oṃ śabdavācyam oṃ śabdapratīkaṃ ca // KaUBh_2.15/1,2.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:456: etad dhy evākṣaraṃ brahma etad dhy evākṣaraṃ param /
GSP33samkaubh_u:457: etad dhy evākṣaraṃ jñātvā yo yad icchati tasya tat // KaU_2.16/1,2.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:458: ata etad dhy evākṣaraṃ brahmāparam etad dhy evākṣaraṃ paraṃ ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:461: yo yad icchati paramaparaṃ vā tasya tad bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:462: paraṃ cej jñātavyam aparaṃ cet prāptavyam // KaUBh_2.16/1,2.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:463: etad ālambanaṃ śreṣṭham etad ālambanaṃ param /
GSP33samkaubh_u:464: etad ālambanaṃ jñātvā brahmaloke mahīyate // KaU_2.17/1,2.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:465: yata evam ata eva etad ālambanaṃ brahmaprāptyālambanānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ praśasyatamam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:468: parasmin brahmaṇy aparasmiṃś ca brahmabhūto brahmavad upāsyo bhavatīty arthaḥ // KaUBh_2.17/1,2.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:470: ity ādinā pṛṣṭasyātmano 'śeṣaviśeṣarahitasyālambanatvena pratīkatvena coṅkāro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:473: na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścin nāyaṃ kutaścin na babhūva kaścit /
GSP33samkaubh_u:474: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre // KaU_2.18/1,2.18 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:475: na jāyate notpadyate mriyate vā na mriyate cotpattimato vastuno 'nityasyānekā vikriyās
GSP33samkaubh_u:476: tāsām ādyante janmavināśalakṣaṇe vikriya ihātmani pratiṣidhyete prathamaṃ sarvavikriyāpratiṣedhārthaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:480: kiñ ca nāyam ātmā kutaścit kāraṇāntarād babhūva na prabhūtaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:481: asmāc cātmano na babhūva kaścid arthāntarabhūtaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:484: ayaṃ tu śāśvato 'ta eva purāṇaḥ purāpi nava eveti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:485: yo hy avayavopacayadvāreṇābhinirvartyate sa idānīṃ navo yathāṅkarādis tadviparītas tv ātmā purāṇo vṛddhivivarjita ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:486: yata evam ato na hanyate na hiṃsyate hanyamāne śastrādibhiḥ śarīre /
GSP33samkaubh_u:488: hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:489: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate // KaU_2.19/1,2.19 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:490: evaṃ bhūtam apy ātmānaṃ śarīramātrātmadṛṣṭir hantā ced yadi manyate cintayati hantuṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:491: haniṣyāmy enam iti yo 'py anyo hataḥ so 'pi cen manyate hatam ātmānaṃ hato 'ham ity
GSP33samkaubh_u:492: ubhāv api tau na vijānītaḥ svam ātmānam,
GSP33samkaubh_u:493: yato nāyaṃ hanty avikriyatvād ātmanas tathā na hanyata ākāśavad avikriyatvād eva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:494: ato 'nātmajñaviṣaya eva dharmādharmādilakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro nātmajñasya śrutiprāmāṇyānnyāyāccadharmādharmādyanupapatteḥ // KaUBh_2.19/1,2.19 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:495: aṇor aṇīyān mahato mahīyān ātmāsya jantor nihito guhāyām /
GSP33samkaubh_u:496: tam akratuḥ paśyati vītaśoko dhātuprasādān mahimānam ātmanaḥ // KaU_2.20/1,2.20 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:497: kathaṃ punar ātmānaṃ jānātīty ucyate -- aṇoḥ sūkṣmād aṇīyāñ śyāmākāder aṇutaraḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:499: aṇu mahad vā yad asti loke vastu tat tenaivātmanā nityenātmavat sambhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:501: tasmād asāv evātmāṇor aṇīyān mahato mahīyān sarvanāmarūpavastūpādhikatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:502: sa cātmāsya jantor brahmādistambaparyantasya prāṇijātasya guhāyāṃ hṛdaye nihita ātmabhṛtaḥ sthita ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:505: yadā caivaṃ tadā mana ādīni karaṇāni dhātavaḥ śarīrasya dhāraṇāt prasīdantīty eṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ prasādād ātmano mahimānaṃ karmanimittavṛddhikṣayarahitaṃ paśyaty ayam aham asmīti,
GSP33samkaubh_u:508: anyathā durvijñeyo 'yam ātmā kāmibhiḥ prākṛtapuruṣaiḥ, yasmāt
GSP33samkaubh_u:509: āsīno dūraṃ vrajati śayāno yāti sarvataḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:510: kas taṃ madāmadaṃ devaṃ mad anyo jñātum arhati // KaU_2.21/1,2.21 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:511: āsīno 'vasthito 'cala eva san dūraṃ vrajati śayāno yāti sarvataḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:512: evam asāv ātmā devo madāmadaḥ samado 'madaś ca saharṣo 'harṣaś ca viruddhadharmavān ato 'śakyatvāj jñātuṃ kas taṃ madāmadaṃ devaṃ madanyo jñātum arhati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:513: asmadāder eva sūkṣmabuddheḥ paṇḍitasya vijñeyo 'yam ātmā sthitigatinityānityādiviruddhānekadharmopādhitvād viruddhadharmavān viśvarūpa iva cintāmaṇivat kasyacid avabhāsate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:514: ato durvijñeyatvaṃ darśayati kas taṃ madanyo jñātum arhatīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:515: karaṇānām upaśamaḥ śayanaṃ karaṇajanitasyaikadeśavijñānasyopaśamaḥ śayānasya bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:516: yadā caivaṃ kevalasāmānyavijñānatvāt sarvato yātīva yadā viśeṣavijñānasthaḥ svena
GSP33samkaubh_u:517: rūpeṇa sthita eva san mana ādigatiṣu tadupādhikatvād dūraṃ vrajatīva sa cehaiva vartate //
GSP33samkaubh_u:519: mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // KaU_2.22/1,2.22 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:520: tadvijñānāc ca śokātyaya ity api darśayati -- aśarīraḥ svena rūpeṇākāśakalpa ātmā
GSP33samkaubh_u:521: tam aśarīraṃ śarīreṣu devapitṛmanuṣyādiśarīreṣv anavastheṣv avasthitir ahiteṣv anityeṣv
GSP33samkaubh_u:523: mahāntaṃ mahattvasyopekṣikatvasaṅkāyām āha vibhuṃ vyāpinam ātmānam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:525: ātmaśabdaḥ pratyagātmaviṣaya eva mukhyas tam īdṛśam ātmānaṃ matvāyam aham iti,
GSP33samkaubh_u:528: nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena /
GSP33samkaubh_u:529: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām // KaU_2.23/1,2.23 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:530: yady api durvijñeyo 'yam ātmā tathāpy upāyena suvijñeya evety āha nāyam ātmā pravacanenānekavedasvīkaraṇena labhyo jñeyo,
GSP33samkaubh_u:533: kena tarhi labhya ity ucyate -- yam eva svātmānam eṣa sādhako vṛṇute prārthayate tenaivātmanā varitrā svayam ātmā labhyo jñāyata ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:536: kathaṃ labhyata ity ucyate -- tasyātmakāmasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute prakāśayati pāramārthikīṃ tanūṃ svāṃ svakīyāṃ svayāthātmyam ity arthaḥ // KaUBh_2.23/1,2.23
GSP33samkaubh_u:539: kiñ cānyat / na duścaritāt pratiṣiddhāc chrutismṛtyavihitāt pāpakarmaṇo 'virato 'nuparataḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:542: samāhitacitto 'pi san samādhānaphalārthitvān nāpy aśāntamānaso vyāpṛtacitto vā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:544: yas tu duścaritād virata indriyalaulyāc ca,
GSP33samkaubh_u:545: samāhitacittaḥ samādhānaphalād apy upaśāntamānasaś cācāryavān prajñānena yathoktam ātmānaṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ // KaUBh_2.24/1,2.24 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:546: yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca ubhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:547: mṛtyur yasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ // KaU_2.25/1,2.25 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:549: yas tv anevaṃ bhūtaḥ -- yasyātmano brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca brahmakṣatre sarvadharmavidhāraka api sarvatrāṇabhūta ubha ādano 'śanaṃ bhavataḥ syātām
GSP33samkaubh_u:552: taṃ prākṛtabuddhir yathoktasādhanarahitaḥ san ka itthā ittham evaṃ yathoktasādhanavānivety arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:553: veda vijānāti yatra sa ātmeti // KaUBh_2.25/1,2.25 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:556: ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33samkaubh_u:557: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ // KaU_3.1/1,3.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:560: na tu saphale te yathāvan nirṇīte /
GSP33samkaubh_u:563: evaṃ ca prāptṛprāpyagantṛgantavyavivekārtharatharūpakadvārā dvāv ātmānāv upanyasyete -- ṛtaṃ satyam avaśyambhāvitvāt karmaphalaṃ pibantau /
GSP33samkaubh_u:564: ekas tatra karmaphalaṃ pibati bhuṅkte netaras tathāpi pātṛsambandhāt pibantāv ity ucyate cchatrinyāyena /
GSP33samkaubh_u:565: sukṛtasya svayaṅkṛtasya karmaṇa ṛtam iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:569: parārdhe parasya brahmaṇo 'rdhaṃ sthānaṃ parārdhaṃ hārdākāśam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:571: tatas tasmin parame parārdhe hārdākāśe praviṣṭāv ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:572: tau ca cchāyātapāv iva vilakṣanau saṃsāritvāsaṃsāritvena brahmavido vadanti kathayanti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:576: triḥ kṛtvo nāciketo 'gniś cito yais te triṇāciketāḥ // KaUBh_3.1/1,3.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:577: yaḥ setur ījānānām akṣaraṃ brahma yat param /
GSP33samkaubh_u:578: abhayaṃ titīrṣatāṃ pāraṃ nāciketaṃ śakemahi // KaU_3.2/1,3.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:579: yaḥ setuḥ setur iva setur ījānānāṃ yajamānānāṃ karmiṇāṃ duḥkhasantaraṇārthatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:581: vayaṃ jñātuṃ cetuṃ ca śakemahi śaknuvantaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:582: kiñ ca yac cābhayaṃ bhayaśūnyaṃ saṃsārasya pāraṃ titīrṣatāṃ tartum icchatāṃ brahmavidāṃ yatparamāśrayam akṣaram ātmākhyaṃ brahma,
GSP33samkaubh_u:584: parāpare brahmaṇī karmibrahmavidāśraye veditavye iti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:585: etayor eva hy upanyāsaḥ kṛta “ṛtaṃ pibantau” (KaU 3.1) iti // KaUBh_3.2/1,3.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:586: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ ratham eva tu /
GSP33samkaubh_u:587: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragraham eva ca // KaU_3.3/1,3.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:588: tatra ya upādhikṛtaḥ saṃsārī vidyāvidyāyor adhikṛto mokṣagamanāya saṃsāragamanāya ca,
GSP33samkaubh_u:590: tatrātmānam ṛtapaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ rathinaṃ rathasvāminaṃ viddhi jānīhi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:591: śarīraṃ ratham eva tu rathabaddhahayasthānīyair indriyair ākṛṣyamāṇatvāc charīrasya /
GSP33samkaubh_u:594: sarvaṃ hi dehagataṃ kāryaṃ buddhikartavyam eva prāyeṇa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:596: manasā hi pragṛhītāni śrotrādīni karaṇāni pravartante raśanayevāśvāḥ // KaUBh_3.3/1,3.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:597: indriyāṇi hayān āhur viṣayāṃs teṣu gocarān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:601: teṣv evendriyeṣu hayatvena parikalpiteṣu gocarān mārgān rūpādīn viṣayān viddhi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:602: ātmendriyamanoyuktaṃ śarīrendriyamanobhiḥ sahitaṃ saṃyuktam ātmānaṃ bhokteti saṃsārīty āhur manīṣiṇo vivekinaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:605: tathā ca śrutyantaraṃ kevalasyābhotṛtvam eva darśayati “dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva” (BĀU 4,4.7) ity ādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:606: evañ ca sati vakṣyamāṇarathakalpanayā vaiṣṇavasya padasyātmatayā pratipattir upapadyate,
GSP33samkaubh_u:608: yas tv avijñānavān bhavaty ayuktena manasā sadā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:609: tasyendriyāṇy avaśyāni duṣṭāśvā iva sāratheḥ // KaU_3.5/1,3.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:610: tatraivaṃ sati yas tv avijñānavān yasya buddhyākhyaḥ sārathir avijñāno 'nipuṇo 'vivekī pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca bhavati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:611: yathetaro rathacaryāyām ayuktenāpragṛhītenāsamāhitena manasā pragrahasthānīyena sadā yukto bhavati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:612: tasyākuśalabuddhisārather indriyāṇy aśvasthānīyāny avaśyāny aśakyanivāraṇāni duṣṭāśvā adāntāśvā ivetarasārather bhavanti // KaUBh_3.5/1,3.5
GSP33samkaubh_u:613: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati yuktena manasā sadā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:614: tasyendriyāṇi vaśyāni sadaśvā iva sāratheḥ // KaU_3.6/1,3.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:615: yas tu punaḥ pūrvoktaviparītasārathir bhavati vijñānavān pragṛhītamanāḥ samāhitacittaḥ sadā,
GSP33samkaubh_u:616: tasyāśvasthānīyānīndriyāṇi pravartayituṃ nivartayituṃ vā śakyāni vaśyāni dāntāḥ sadaśvā ivetarasāratheḥ // KaUBh_3.6/1,3.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:617: yas tv avijñānavān bhavaty amanaskaḥ sadāśuciḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:618: na sa tat padam āpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati // KaU_3.7/1,3.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:619: tasya pūrvoktasyāvijñānavata idaṃ phalam āha -- yas tv avijñānavān bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:621: na sa rathī tatpūrvoktam akṣaraṃ yatparaṃ padam āpnoti tena sārathinā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:622: na kevalaṃ tan nāpnoti saṃsāraṃ ca janmamaraṇalakṣaṇam adhigacchati // KaUBh_3.7/1,3.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:623: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati samanaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:624: sa tu tat padam āpnoti yasmād bhūyo na jāyate // KaU_3.8/1,3.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:625: yas tu dvitīyo vijñānavān vījñānavat sārathyupeto rathī vidvān ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:626: yuktamanāḥ samanaskaḥ sa tata eva sadā śuciḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:628: yasmād āptāt padād apracyutaḥ san bhūyaḥ punar na jāyate saṃsāre // KaUBh_3.8/1,3.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:629: vijñānasārathir yas tu manaḥ pragrahavān naraḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:630: so 'dhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // KaU_3.9/1,3.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:631: kiṃ tatpadam ity āha vijñānasārathir yas tu yo vivekabuddhisārathiḥ pūrvokto manaḥpragrahavān
GSP33samkaubh_u:632: pragṛhītamanāḥ samāhitacittaḥ sañ śucir naro vidvān so 'dhvanaḥ saṃsāragateḥ pāraṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:633: param evādhigantavyam ity etad āpnoti mucyate sarvasaṃsārabandhanaiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:634: tad viṣṇor vyāpanaśīlasya brahmaṇaḥ paramātmano vāsudevākhyasya paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ padaṃ sthānam,
GSP33samkaubh_u:635: satattvaṃ ity etad yad asāv āpnoti vidvān // KaUBh_3.9/1,3.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:636: adhunā yatpadaṃ gantavyaṃ tasyendriyāṇi sthūlāny ārabhya sūkṣmatāratamyakrameṇa pratyagātmatayādhigamaḥ kartavya ity evam artham idam ārabhyate
GSP33samkaubh_u:637: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:638: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ // KaU_3.10/1,3.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:640: tāni yair arthair ātmaprakāśanāyārabdhāni tebhya indriyebhyaḥ svakāryebhyas te parā hy arthāḥ sūkṣmā mahāntaś ca pratyagātmabhūtāś ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:641: tebhyo 'py arthebhyaś ca paraṃ sūkṣmataraṃ mahatpratyagātmabhūtaṃ ca manaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:643: manaso 'pi parā sūkṣmatarā mahattarā pratyagātmabhūtā ca buddhiḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:645: uddher ātmā sarvaprāṇibuddhīnāṃ pratyagātmabhūtatvād ātmā mahān sarvamahattvād avyaktād
GSP33samkaubh_u:646: yat prathamaṃ jātaṃ hairaṇyagarbhaṃ tattvaṃ bodhābodhātmakaṃ mahān ātmā buddheḥ param
GSP33samkaubh_u:648: mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:649: puruśān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ // KaU_3.11/1,3.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:650: mahato 'pi paraṃ sūkṣmataraṃ pratyagātmabhūtaṃ sarvamahattaraṃ cāvyaktaṃ sarvasya
GSP33samkaubh_u:652: avyaktam avyākṛtākāśādinām avācyaṃ paramātmany otaprotabhāvena samāśritaṃ vaṭakaṇikāyām
GSP33samkaubh_u:654: tasmād avyaktāt paraḥ sūkṣmataraḥ sarvakāraṇakāraṇatvāt pratyagātmatvāc ca mahāṃś ca,
GSP33samkaubh_u:656: tato 'nyasya parasya prasaṅgaṃ nivārayann āha -- puruṣān na paraṃ kiñcid iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:657: yasmān nāsti puruṣāc cinmātrāghanāt paraṃ kiñcid api vastvantaram,
GSP33samkaubh_u:658: tasmāt sūkṣmatvamahattvapratyagātmatvānāṃ sā kāṣṭhā niṣṭhā paryavasānam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:660: ata eva ca gantṝṇāṃ sarvagatimatāṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ sā parā prakṛṣṭā gatiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:663: eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho 'tmā na prakāśate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:664: dṛṣyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ // KaU_3.12/1,3.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:668: sarvasya pratyagātmatvād avagatir eva gatir ity upacaryate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:670: yo hi gantā so 'yam apratyagrūpaṃ gacchaty anātmabhūtaṃ na vindati svarūpeṇa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:671: tathā ca śrutiḥ -- “anadhvagā adhvasu pārayiṣṇavaḥ” (Itihāsa-Upaniṣad 18) ity ādyā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:673: eṣa puruṣaḥ sarveṣu brahmādistambaparyanteṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ saṃvṛto darśanaśravaṇādikarmāvidyāmāyāc channo 'ta evātmā na prakāśata ātmatvena kasyacit /
GSP33samkaubh_u:675: yad ayaṃ sarvo jantuḥ paramārthataḥ paramārthasatattvo 'py evaṃ bodhyamāno 'haṃ paramātmeti na gṛhṇāti,
GSP33samkaubh_u:676: anātmānaṃ dehendriyādisaṅghātam ātmano dṛśyamānam api ghaṭādivad ātmatvenāham amuṣya putra ity anucyamāno 'pi gṛhṇāti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:677: nūnaṃ parasyaiva māyayā momuhyamānaḥ sarvo loko bambhramīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:678: tathā ca smaraṇam “nāhaṃ prakāśaḥ sarvasya yogamāyāsamāvṛtaḥ” (BhG 7.25) ity ādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:679: nanu viruddham idam ucyate “matvā dhīro na śocati” (KaU 2.22)
GSP33samkaubh_u:682: asaṃskṛtabuddher avijñeyatvān na prakāśata ity uktam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:683: dṛśyate tu saṃskṛtayāgryayā agram ivāgryayā tayā,
GSP33samkaubh_u:686: sūkṣmadarśibhir indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā ity ādiprakāreṇa sūkṣmatāpāramparyadarśanena
GSP33samkaubh_u:687: paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te sūkṣmadarśinas taiḥ sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ paṇḍitair
GSP33samkaubh_u:689: yacched vāṅmanasī prājñas tad yacchej jñāna ātmani /
GSP33samkaubh_u:690: jñānam ātmani mahati niyacchet tad yacchec chānta ātmani // KaU_3.13/1,3.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:691: tatpratipattyupāyam āha yacchen niyacched upasaṃharet prājño vivekī /
GSP33samkaubh_u:696: tac ca mano yacchej jñāne prakāśasvarūpe buddhāv ātmani /
GSP33samkaubh_u:697: buddhir hi mana ādikaraṇānyāpnotīty ātmā pratyak ca teṣām /
GSP33samkaubh_u:698: jñānaṃ buddhim ātmani mahati prathamaje niyacchet /
GSP33samkaubh_u:699: prathamajavat svacchasvabhāvakam ātmano vijñānam āpādayed ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:700: tañ ca mahāntam ātmānaṃ yacchec chānte sarvaviśeṣapratyastamitarūpe 'vikriye sarvāntare sarvabuddhipratyayasākṣiṇi mukhya ātmani // KaUBh_3.13/1,3.13
GSP33samkaubh_u:702: kṣurasya dhārā niśitā duratyayā durgaṃ pathas tat kavayo vadanti // KaU_3.14/1,3.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:703: evaṃ puruṣa ātmani sarvaṃ pravilāpya nāmarūpakarmatrayaṃ yan mithyājñānavijṛmbhitaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:705: marīcirajjugaganasvarūpadarśanenaiva svasthaḥ praśāntaḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhavati yataḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:706: atas taddarśanārtham anādyāprasuptā uttiṣṭhata he jantavaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:711: tadupadiṣṭaṃ sarvāntaram ātmānam aham asmīti nibodhatāvagacchata /
GSP33samkaubh_u:712: na hy upekṣatavyam iti śrutir anukampayāha mātṛvat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:715: kṣurasya dhārāgraṃ niśitā tīkṣṇīkṛtā duratyayā duḥkhenātyayo yasyāḥ sā duratyayā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:716: yathā sā padbhyāṃ durgamanīyā tathā durgaṃ duḥsampādyam ity etat pathaḥ panthānaṃ tat taṃ jñānalakṣaṇaṃ mārgaṃ kavayo medhāvino vadanti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:717: jñeyasyātisūkṣmatvāt tadviṣayasya jñānamārgasya duḥsampādyatvaṃ vadantīty abhiprāyaḥ // KaUBh_3.14/1,3.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:719: sthūlā tāvad iyaṃ medinī śabdasparśarūparasagandhopacitā sarvendriyaviṣayabhūtā tathā śarīram /
GSP33samkaubh_u:720: tatraikaikaguṇāpakarṣeṇa gandhādīnāṃ sūkṣmatvamahattvaviśuddhatvanityatvāditāratamyaṃ dṛṣṭamabādiṣu yāvad ākāśam iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:721: te gandhādayaḥ sarva eva sthūlatvād vikārāḥ śabdāntā yatra na santi kim u tasya sūkṣmatvādiniratiśayatvaṃ vaktavyam ity etad darśayati śrutiḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:722: aśabdam asparśam arūpam avyayaṃ tathārasaṃ nityam agandhavac ca yat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:723: anādy anantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya tan mṛtyumukhāt pramucyate // KaU_3.15/1,3.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:724: aśabdam asparśam arūpam arasam agandhavac ca yad etad vyākhyātaṃ brahmāvyayaṃ yad dhi śabdādimattadvyetīdaṃ tv aśabdādimattvād avyayaṃ na vyeti na kṣīyate,
GSP33samkaubh_u:726: yad dhi vyeti tad anityam idaṃ tu na vyety ato nityam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:727: itaś ca nityam anādyavidyamāna ādiḥ kāraṇam asya tad idam anādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:728: yad dhy ādimattatkāryatvād anityaṃ kāraṇe pralīyate yathā pṛthivyādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:729: idaṃ tu sarvakāraṇatvād akāryam akāryatvān nityam,
GSP33samkaubh_u:730: na tasya kāraṇam asti yasmin pralīyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:731: tathānantam avidyamāno 'ntaḥ kāryam asya tad anantam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:733: na ca tathāpy antavattvaṃ brahmaṇo 'to 'pi nityam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:734: mahato mahattattvād buddhyākhyāt paraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ nityavijñaptisvarūpatvāt sarvasākṣi hi sarvabhūtātmatvād brahma /
GSP33samkaubh_u:735: uktaṃ hi “eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu” (KaU 3.12) ity ādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:736: dhruvaṃ ca kūṭasthaṃ nityaṃ na pṛthivyādivad āpekṣikaṃ nityatvam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:737: tad evambhūtaṃ brahmātmānaṃ nicāyyāvagamya tam ātmānaṃ mṛtyumukhān mṛtyugocarād avidyākāmakarmalakṣaṇāt pramucyate vimucyate // KaUBh_3.15/1,3.15
GSP33samkaubh_u:739: uktvā śrutvā ca medhāvī brahmaloke mahīyate // KaU_3.16/1,3.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:740: prastutavijñānastutyartham āha śrutiḥ -- nāciketaṃ naciketasā prāptaṃ nāciketaṃ mṛtyunā
GSP33samkaubh_u:741: proktaṃ mṛtyuproktam idam ākhyānam upākhyānaṃ vallītrayalakṣaṇaṃ sanātanaṃ cirantanaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:742: vaidikatvād uktvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śrutvā cācāryebhyo medhāvī brahmaiva loko brahmalokas
GSP33samkaubh_u:743: tasmin brahmaloke mahīyata ātmabhūta upāsyo bhavatīty arthaḥ // KaUBh_3.16/1,3.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:744: ya imaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ śrāvayed brahmasaṃsadi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:745: prayataḥ śrāddhakāle vā tad ānantyāya kalpate tad ānantyāya kalpata iti // KaU_3.17/1,3.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:747: yaḥ kaścid imaṃ granthaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ guhyaṃ gopyaṃ śrāvayed granthato 'rthataś
GSP33samkaubh_u:748: ca brāhmaṇānāṃ saṃsadi brahmasaṃsadi prayataḥ śucir bhūtvā śrāddhakāle vā śrāvayed
GSP33samkaubh_u:753: “eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho 'tmā na prakāśate dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā” (KaU 3.12) ity uktam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:754: kaḥ punaḥ pratibandho 'grayāyā buddher yena tadabhāvād ātmā na dṛśyata iti tadadarśanakāraṇapradarśanārthā vally ārabhyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:755: vijñāte hi śreyaḥpratibandhakāraṇe tadapanayanāya yatna ārabdhuṃ śakyate nānyatheti --
GSP33samkaubh_u:756: parāñci khāni vyatṛṇat svayaṃbhūs tasmāt parāṅ paśyati nāntarātman /
GSP33samkaubh_u:757: kaścid dhīraḥ pratyag ātmānam aikṣad āvṛttacakṣur amṛtatvam icchan // KaU_4.1/2,1.1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:761: yasmād evaṃ svābhāvikāni tāni vyatṛṇaddhiṃsitavān hananaṃ kṛtavān ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:763: svayambhūḥ parameśvaraḥ svayam eva svatantro bhavati sarvadā na paratantra iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:764: tasmāt parāṅ parāg rūpān anātmabhūtāñ śabdādīn paśyaty upalabhata upalabdhā nāntarātman nāntarātmānam ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:765: evaṃsvabhāve 'pi sati lokasya kaścin nadyāḥ pratisrotaḥ pravartanam iva dhīro dhīmān vivekī pratyagātmānaṃ pratyak cāsāv ātmā ceti pratyagātmā
GSP33samkaubh_u:768: “yac cāpnoti yadādatte yac cātti viṣayān iha /
GSP33samkaubh_u:769: yac cāsya santato bhāvas tasmād ātmeti kīrtyate” (LiP 1,70.96)
GSP33samkaubh_u:771: taṃ pratyagātmānaṃ svaṃ svabhāvam aikṣad apaśyat paśyatīty arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:773: kathaṃ paśyatīty ucyate -- āvṛttacakṣurāvṛttaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādikamindriyajātam aśeṣaviṣayādyasya sa āvṛttacakṣuḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:775: na hi bāhyaviṣayālocanaparatvaṃ pratyagātmekṣaṇaṃ caikasya sambhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:776: kim arthaṃ punar itthaṃ mahatā prayāsena svabhāvapravṛttinirodhaṃ kṛtvā dhīraḥ pratyagātmānaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:777: paśyatīty ucyate -- amṛtatvam amaraṇadharmatvaṃ nityasvabhāvatām icchann ātmana ity
GSP33samkaubh_u:779: parācaḥ kāmān anuyanti bālās te mṛtyor yanti vitatasya pāśam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:780: atha dhīrā amṛtatvaṃ viditvā dhruvam adhruveṣv iha na prārthayante // KaU_4.2/2,1.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:781: yat tāvat svābhāvikaṃ parāg evānātmadarśanaṃ tad ātmadarśanasya pratibandhakāraṇam
GSP33samkaubh_u:782: avidyā tatpratikūlatvād yā ca parāg evāvidyopapradarśiteṣu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣu bhogeṣu tṛṣṇā
GSP33samkaubh_u:783: tābhyām avidyātṛṣṇābhyāṃ pratibaddhātmadarśanaḥ parāco bahirgatān eva kāmān kāmyān
GSP33samkaubh_u:785: te tena kāraṇena mṛtyor avidyākāmakarmasamudāyasya yanti gacchanti vitatasya vistīrṇasya sarvato vyāptasya pāśaṃ pāśyate badhyate yena taṃ pāśaṃ dehendriyādisaṃyogalakṣaṇam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:787: yata evam atha tasmād dhīrā vivekinaḥ pratyagātmasvarūpāvasthān alakṣaṇam amṛtatvaṃ dhruvaṃ viditvā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:788: dehādyamṛtatvaṃ hy abruvam idaṃ tu pratyagātmasvarūpāvasthān alakṣaṇaṃ dhruvaṃ “na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān” (BĀU 4,4.23) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:789: tad evambhūtaṃ kūṭastham avicālyam amṛtatvaṃ viditvādhruveṣu sarvapadārtheṣv anityeṣu
GSP33samkaubh_u:790: nirdhāryaṃ brāhmaṇā iha saṃsāre 'narthaprāye na prārthayante kiñcid api pratyagātmadarśanapratikūlatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:792: yena rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ śabdān sparśīṃś ca maithunān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:795: yad vijñānān na kiñcid anyat prārthayante brahmaṇāḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:797: yena vijñānasvabhāvenātmanā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ śabdān sparśāṃś ca maithunān maithunanimittān sukhapratyayān vijānāti vispaṣṭaṃ jānāti sarvo lokaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:798: nanu naivaṃ prasiddhir lokasyātmanā dehādivilakṣaṇenāhaṃ vijānāmīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:801: dehādisaṅghātasyāpi śabdādisvarūpatvāviśeṣād vijñeyatvāviśeṣāc ca na yuktaṃ vijñātṛtvam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:802: yadi hi dehādisaṅghāto rūpādyātmakaḥ san rūpādīn vijānīyāt tarhi bāhyā api rūpādayo 'nyonyaṃ svaṃ svaṃ rūpañ ca vijānīyuḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:804: tasmād dehādilakṣaṇāṃś ca rūpādīn etenaiva dehādivyatiriktenaiva vijñānasvabhāvenātmanā vijānāti lokaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:805: yathā yena loho dahati so 'gnir iti tadvat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:806: ātmano 'vijñeyaṃ kim atrāsmiṃl loke pariśiṣyate na kiñcit pariśiṣyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:808: yasyātmano 'vijñeyaṃ na kiñcit pariśiṣyate sa ātmā sarvajñaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:810: kiṃ tad yan naciketasā pṛṣṭaṃ devādibhir api vicikitsitaṃ dharmādibhyo 'nyad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ yasmāt paraṃ nāsti tadvai etad adhigatam ity arthaḥ // KaUBh_4.3/2,1.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:812: mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // KaU_4.4/2,1.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:813: atisūkṣmatvād durvijñeyam iti matvaitam evārthaṃ punaḥ punar āha -- svapnāntaṃ svapnamadhyaṃ svapnavijñeyam ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:815: ubhau svapnajāgaritāntau yenātmanānupaśyati loka iti sarvaṃ pūrvavat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:816: taṃ mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānaṃ matvāvagamyātmabhāvena sākṣād aham asmi paramātmeti dhīro na śocati // KaUBh_4.4/2,1.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:817: ya imaṃ madhvadaṃ veda ātmānaṃ jīvamantikāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:820: kiñca yaḥ kaścid imaṃ madhvadaṃ karmaphalabhujaṃ jīvaṃ prāṇādikalāpasya dhārayitāram ātmānaṃ veda vijānāty antikād antike samīpa īśānam īśitāraṃ bhūtabhavyasya kālatrayasya,
GSP33samkaubh_u:821: tatas tadvijñānād ūrdhvam ātmānaṃ na vijugupsate na gopāyitum icchaty abhayaprāptatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:822: yāvad dhi bhayam adhyastho 'nityam ātmānaṃ manyate tāvad gopāyitum icchaty ātmānaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:823: yadā tu nityam advaitam ātmānaṃ vijānāti tadā kaḥ kiṃ kuto vā gopāyitum icchet /
GSP33samkaubh_u:824: etad vai tad iti pūrvavat // KaUBh_4.5/2,1.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:825: yaḥ pūrvaṃ tapaso jātam adbhyaḥ pūrvam ajāyata /
GSP33samkaubh_u:826: guhāṃ praviśya tiṣṭhantaṃ yo bhūtebhir vyapaśyata //
GSP33samkaubh_u:828: yaḥ pratyagātmeśvarabhāvena nirdiṣṭaḥ sa sarvātmety etad darśayati -- yaḥ kaścin mumukṣuḥ pūrvaṃ prathamaṃ tapaso jñānādilakṣaṇabrahmaṇa ity etaj jātam utpannaṃ hiraṇyagarbham /
GSP33samkaubh_u:829: kim apekṣya pūrvam ity āha -- adbhyaḥ pūrvam apsahitebhyaḥ pañcabhūtebhyo na kevalābhyo 'dbhya ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:830: ajāyata utpanno yas taṃ prathamajaṃ devādiśarīrāṇy utpādya sarvaprāṇiguhāṃ hṛdayākāśaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:831: praviśya tiṣṭhantaṃ śabdādīn upalabhamānaṃ bhūtebhir bhūtaiḥ kāryakaraṇalakṣaṇaiḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:832: saha tiṣṭhantaṃ yo vyapaśyata yaḥ paśyatīty etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:833: ya evaṃ paśyati sa etad eva paśyati yat tat prakṛtaṃ brahma // KaUBh_4.6/2,1.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:835: guhāṃ praviśya tiṣṭhantīṃ yā bhūtebhir vyajāyata //
GSP33samkaubh_u:837: kiñ ca -- yā saravadevatāmayī saravadevatātmikā prāṇena hiraṇyagarbharūpeṇa parasmād brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati śabdādīnām adanād aditis tāṃ pūrvavad guhāṃ praviśya tiṣṭhantīm aditim /
GSP33samkaubh_u:838: tām eva viśinaṣṭi -- yā bhūtebhir bhūtaiḥ samanvitā vyajāyata utpannety etat // KaUBh_4.7/2,1.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:839: araṇyor nihito jātavedā garbha iva subhṛto garbhiṇībhiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:840: divediva īḍyo jāgṛvadbhir haviṣmadbhir manuṣyebhir agniḥ //
GSP33samkaubh_u:842: kiñ ca -- yo 'dhiyajña uttarādharāraṇyor nihitaḥ sthito jātavedā agniḥ punaḥ sarvahaviṣāṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:843: bhoktā adhyātmaṃ ca yogibhir garbha iva garbhiṇībhir antarvatnībhir agarhitānnabhojanādinā
GSP33samkaubh_u:844: yathā garbhaḥ subhṛtaḥ suṣṭhu samyagbhṛto loke,
GSP33samkaubh_u:845: ivettham eva rtvigbhir yogibhiś ca sumṛta ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:846: kiñ ca dive dive 'hany ahanīḍyaḥ stutyo vandyaś ca karmibhir yogibhiś cādhvare hṛdaye ca jāgṛvadbhir jāgaraṇaśīlair apramattair ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:848: manuṣyebhir manuṣyair agnir etad vai tat tad eva prakṛtaṃ brahma // KaUBh_4.8/2,1.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:849: yataś codeti sūryo astaṃ yatra ca gacchati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:850: taṃ devāḥ sarve arpitās tad u nātyeti kaścana //
GSP33samkaubh_u:852: kiñ ca -- yataś ca yasmāt prāṇād udety uttiṣṭhati sūryo 'staṃ nimlocanaṃ yatra yasminn eva ca prāṇo 'hanyahani gacchati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:854: sarva agnyādayo 'dhidaivaṃ vāgādayaś cādhyātmaṃ sarve viśve 'rā iva rathanābhāv arpitāḥ sampraveśitāḥ sthitikāle /
GSP33samkaubh_u:857: tad u nātyeti nātītya tadātmakatāṃ tadanyatvaṃ gacchati kaścana kaścid api /
GSP33samkaubh_u:859: yad eveha tad amutra yad amutra tad anv iha /
GSP33samkaubh_u:860: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati // KaU_4.10/2,1.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:861: yad brahmādisthāvarānteṣu vartamānaṃ tat tadupādhitvād brahmavadavabhāsamānaṃ saṃsāry
GSP33samkaubh_u:862: anyat parasmād brahmaṇa iti mā bhūt kasyacid āśaṅketīdam āha -- yad eveha kāryakāraṇopādhisamanvitaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:863: saṃsāradharmavadavabhāsamānam avivekināṃ tad eva svātmastham amutra nityavijñānaghanasvabhāvaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:865: yac cāmutrāmuṣminn ātmani sthitaṃ tad eveha nāmarūpakāryakaraṇopādhim anu vibhāvyamānaṃ nānyat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:866: tatraivaṃ saty upādhisvabhāvabhedadṛṣṭilakṣaṇayāvidyayā mohitaḥ san ya iha brahmaṇyanānābhūte parasmād anyo 'haṃ matto 'nyatparaṃ brahmeti nāneva bhinnam iva paśyaty upalabhate,
GSP33samkaubh_u:867: sa mṛtyor maraṇān mṛtyuṃ maraṇaṃ punaḥ punar jananamaraṇabhāvam āpnoti pratipadyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:869: vijñānaikarasaṃ nairantaryeṇākāśavat paripūrṇa brahmaivāham asmīti paśyed iti vākyārthaḥ // KaUBh_4.10/2,1.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:871: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyuṃ gacchati ya iha nāneva paśyati // KaU_4.11/2,1.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:872: prāgekatvavijñānācāryāgamasaṃskṛtena manasaivedaṃ brahmaikarasam āptavyam ātmaiva nānyad astīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:873: āpte ca nānātvapratyupasthāpikāyā avidyāyā nivṛttatvād iha brahmaṇi nānā nāsti kiñcanāṇumātram api /
GSP33samkaubh_u:874: yas tu punar avidyātimiradṛṣṭiṃ na muñcatīha brahmaṇi nāneva paśyati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:875: sa mṛtyor mṛtyuṃ gacchaty eva svalpam api bhedam adhyāropayann ity arthaḥ // KaUBh_4.11/2,1.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:876: punar api tad eva prakṛtaṃ brahmāha --
GSP33samkaubh_u:880: aṅguṣṭhamātro 'ṅguṣṭhaparimāṇo 'ṅguṣṭhaparimāṇaṃ hṛdayapuṇḍarīkaṃ tacchidravarty antaḥ -- karaṇopādhir aṅguṣṭhamātro 'ṅguṣṭhamātravaṃśaparvamadhyavarty ambaravat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:882: madhya ātmani śarīre tiṣṭhati yas tam ātmānam īśānaṃ bhūtabhavyasya viditvā na tad ity ādi pūrvavat // KaUBh_4.12/2,1.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:884: īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa evādya sa u śvaḥ //
GSP33samkaubh_u:888: yas tv evaṃ lakṣito yogibhir hṛdaya īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa eva nityaḥ kūṭastho 'dyedānīṃ prāṇiṣu vartamānaḥ sa u śvo 'pi vartiṣyate,
GSP33samkaubh_u:889: nānyas tatsamo 'nyaś ca janiṣyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:891: ity ayaṃ pakṣo nyāyato 'prāpto 'pi svavacanena śrutyā pratyuktas tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgavādaś ca // KaUBh_4.13/2,1.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:893: evaṃ dharmān pṛthak paśyaṃs tān evānu vidhāvati // KaU_4.14/2,1.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:894: punar api bhedadarśanāpavādaṃ brahmaṇa āha -- yathodakaṃ durge durgame deśa ucchrite vṛṣṭaṃ siktaṃ parvateṣu parvavatsu nimnapradeśeṣu vidhāvati vikīrṇaṃ sad vinaśyati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:895: evaṃ dharmān ātmano 'bhinnān pṛthak paśyan pṛthag eva pratiśarīraṃ paśyaṃs tān eva śarīrabhedānuvartino 'nuvidhāvati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:896: śarīrabhedam eva pṛthak punaḥ punaḥ pratipadyata ity arthaḥ // KaUBh_4.14/2,1.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:897: yathodakaṃ śuddhe śuddham āsiktaṃ tādṛg eva bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:898: evaṃ muner vijānata ātmā bhavati gautama // KaU_4.15/2,1.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:901: advayam ātmānaṃ paśyato vijānato muner mananaśīlasyātmasvarūpaṃ kathaṃ sambhavatīty
GSP33samkaubh_u:902: ucyate yathodakaṃ śuddhe prasanne śuddhaṃ prasannam āsiktaṃ prakṣiptam ekarasam eva
GSP33samkaubh_u:903: nānyathā tādṛg eva bhavaty ātmāpy evam eva bhavaty ekatvaṃ vijānato muner mananaśīlasya
GSP33samkaubh_u:904: he gautama. tasmāt kutārkikabhedadṛṣṭiṃ nāstikakudṛṣṭiṃ cojjhitvā mātṛpitṛsahastrebhyo
GSP33samkaubh_u:905: 'pi hitaiṣiṇā vedenopadiṣṭam ātmaikatvadarśanaṃ śāntadarpair ādaraṇīyam ity arthaḥ //
GSP33samkaubh_u:908: punar api prakārāntareṇa brahmatattvanirdhāraṇārtho 'yam ārambho durvijñeyatvād brahmaṇaḥ --
GSP33samkaubh_u:910: anuṣṭhāya na śocati vimuktaś ca vimucyate //
GSP33samkaubh_u:915: tathedaṃ purasāmānyād anekopakaraṇasaṃhataṃ śarīraṃ svātmanāsaṃhatarājasthānīyasvāmyarthaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:916: tac cedaṃ śarīrākhyaṃ puram ekādaśadvāram ekādaśa dvārāṇy asya sapta śīrṣaṇyāni,
GSP33samkaubh_u:921: avakracetaso 'vakram akuṭilam ādityaprakāśavan nityam evāvasthitam ekarūpaṃ ceto vijñānam asyety avakracetās tasyāvakracetaso rājasthānīyasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:922: yasyedaṃ puraṃ taṃ parameśvaraṃ purasvāminam anuṣṭhāya dhyātvā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:924: taṃ sarvaiṣaṇāvinirmuktaḥ san samaṃ sarvabhūtasthaṃ dhyātvā na śocati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:927: vimuktaś ca san vimucyate punaḥ śarīraṃ na gṛhṇātīty arthaḥ // KaUBh_5.1/2,2,1 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:928: haṃsaḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir duroṇasat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:929: nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtaṃ bṛhat // KaU_5.2/2,2.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:930: sa tu naikaśarīrapuravarttyevātmā kiṃ tārhi sarvapūravartī /
GSP33samkaubh_u:936: vedyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ sīdatīti vediṣad “iyaṃ vediḥ paro 'ntaḥ pṛthivyāḥ” (RS 2,3.20)
GSP33samkaubh_u:938: atithiḥ somaḥ san duroṇe kalaśe sīdatīti duroṇasat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:942: ṛtasad ṛtaṃ satyaṃ yajño vā tasmin sīdatīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:945: gojā gavi pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavādirūpeṇa jāyata iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:950: yadāpy āditya eva mantreṇocyate tad apy ātmasvarūpatvam ādityasyāṅgīkṛtatvād brāhmaṇo vyākhyāne 'py avirodhaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:951: sarvavyāpy eka evātmā jagato nātmabheda iti mantrārthaḥ // KaUBh_5.2/2,2.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:952: ūrdhvaṃ prāṇam unnayati apānaṃ pratyag asyati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:953: madhye vāmanam āsīnaṃ viśve devā upāsate // KaU_5.3/2,2.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:954: ātmanaḥ svarūpādhigame liṅgam ucyate -- ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayāt prāṇaṃ prāṇavṛttiṃ vāyum unnayaty ūrdhvaṃ gamayati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:955: tathāpānaṃ pratyagadho 'syati kṣipati ya iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:956: taṃ madhye hṛdayapuṇḍarīkākāśa āsīnaṃ buddhāv abhivyaktavijñānaprakāśanaṃ vāmanaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:957: vananīyaṃ sambhajanīyaṃ viśve sarve devāś cakṣurādayaḥ prāṇā rūpādivijñānaṃ balim
GSP33samkaubh_u:958: upāharanto viśva iva rājānam upāsate tādarthyenānuparatavyāpārā bhavantīty arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:959: yad arthā yat prayuktāś ca sarve vāyukaraṇavyāpārāḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:964: kiñ cāsya śarīrasthasyātmano visraṃsamānasya bhraṃśamānasya dehino dehavataḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:966: kim atra pariśiṣyate prāṇādikalāpe na kiñcana pariśiṣyate 'tra dehe purasvāmividravaṇa
GSP33samkaubh_u:967: iva paravāsināṃ yasyātmanopagame kṣaṇamātrāt kāryakaraṇakalāparūpaṃ sarvam idaṃ hatabalaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:968: vidhvastaṃ bhavati vinaṣṭaṃ bhavati so 'nyaḥ siddha ātmā // KaUBh_5.4/2,2.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:969: na prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana /
GSP33samkaubh_u:970: itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminn etāv upāśritau // KaU_5.5/2,2.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:971: syān mataṃ prāṇāpānādyapagamād evedaṃ vidhvastaṃ bhavati na tu tadvyatiriktātmāpagamāt prāṇādibhir eveha martyo jīvatīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:973: na prāṇena nāpānena cakṣurādinā vā martyo manuṣyo dehavān kaścana jīvati na ko 'pi jīvati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:974: na hy eṣāṃ parārthānāṃ saṃhatyakāritvāj jīvanahetutvam upapadyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:975: svārthanāsaṃhatena pareṇa kenacid aprayuktaṃ saṃhatānām avasthānaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ yathā gṛhādīnāṃ loke,
GSP33samkaubh_u:976: tathā prāṇādīnām api saṃhatatvād bhavitum arhati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:977: ata itareṇa itareṇaiva saṃhataprāṇādivilakṣaṇena tu sarve saṃhatāḥ santo jīvanti prāṇān dhārayanti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:978: yasmin saṃhatavilakṣaṇa ātmani sati parasminn etau prāṇāpānau cakṣurādibhiḥ saṃhatāv upāśritau,
GSP33samkaubh_u:979: yasyāsaṃhatasyārthe prāṇāpānādiḥ sarvaṃ vyāpāraṃ kurvan vartate saṃhataḥ san sa tato 'nyaḥ siddha ity abhiprāyaḥ // KaUBh_5.5/2,2.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:980: hanta ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:981: yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama // KaU_5.6/2,2.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:982: hantedānīṃ punar api te tubhyam idaṃ guhyaṃ gopyaṃ brahma sanātanaṃ cirantanaṃ pravakṣyāmi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:984: avijñānāc ca yasya maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā cātmā bhavati yathātmā saṃsarati tathā śṛṇu he gautama // KaUBh_5.6/2,2.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:987: yoniṃ yonidvāraṃ śukrabījasamanvitāḥ santo 'nye kecid avidyāvanto mūḍhāḥ prapadyante śarīratvāya śarīragrahaṇārthaṃ dehino dehavantaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:989: sthāṇuṃ vṛkṣādisthāvarabhāvam anye 'tyantādhamā maraṇaṃ prāpyānusaṃyanty anugacchanti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:990: yathākarma yady asya karma tadyathākarma yair yādṛśaṃ karmeha janmani kṛtaṃ tadvaśenety etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:991: tathā ca yathāśrutaṃ yādṛśaṃ ca vijñānam upārjitaṃ tadanurūpam eva śarīraṃ pratipadyanta ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:993: ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:994: tad eva śukraṃ tad brahma tad evāmṛtam ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:995: tasmiṃl lokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tad u nātyeti kaścana //
GSP33samkaubh_u:997: yatpratijñātaṃ guhyaṃ brahma pravakṣyāmīti tadāha -- ya eṣa supteṣu prāṇādiṣu jāgartiṃ na svapiti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:999: kāmaṃ kāmaṃ taṃ tam abhipretaṃ stryādyartham avidyayā nirmimāṇo
GSP33samkaubh_u:1001: tad eva śukraṃ śubhraṃ śuddhaṃ tad brahma nānyad guhyaṃ brahmāsti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1003: kiñ ca pṛthivyādayo lokās tasminn eva sarve brahmaṇi śritā āśritāḥ sarvalokakāraṇatvāt tasya /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1004: tad u nātyeti kaścanety ādi pūrvavad eva // KaUBh_5.8/2,2.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1005: agnir yathaiko bhuvanaṃ praviṣṭo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1006: ekas tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo bahiś ca // KaU_5.9/2,2.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1008: asakṛd ucyamānam apy anṛjubuddhīnāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ cetasi nādhīyata iti tatpratipādana
GSP33samkaubh_u:1009: ādaravatī punaḥ punar āha śrutiḥ -- agnir yathaika eva prakāśātmā san bhuvanaṃ bhavanty
GSP33samkaubh_u:1010: asmin bhūtānīti bhuvanam ayaṃ lokas tam imaṃ praviṣṭo 'nupraviṣṭaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1011: rūpaṃ rūpaṃ prati dārvādidāhyabhedaṃ pratīty arthaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1012: pratirūpas tatra tatra pratirūpavān dāhyabhedena bahuvidho babhūva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1013: eka eva tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā rūpaṃ rūpaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām abhyantara ātmātisūkṣmatvād
GSP33samkaubh_u:1014: dārvādiṣv iva sarvadehaṃ prati praviṣṭatvāt pratirūpo babhūva bahiś ca svenāvikṛtena
GSP33samkaubh_u:1016: vāyur yathaiko bhuvanaṃ praviṣṭo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1017: ekas tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo bahiś ca // KaU_5.10/2,2.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1018: tathānyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ -- vāyur yathaika ity ādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1020: rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūvety ādi samānam // KaUBh_5.10/2,2.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1021: sūryo yathā sarvalokasya cakṣur na lipyate cākṣuṣair bāhyadoṣaiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1022: ekas tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ // KaU_5.11/2,2.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1023: ekasya sarvātmatve saṃsāraduḥkhitvaṃ parasyaiva syād iti prāpta idam ucyate -- sūryo
GSP33samkaubh_u:1024: yathā cakṣuṣa ālokenopakāraṃ kurvan mūtrapurīṣādyaśuciprakāśanena taddarśinaḥ sarvalokasya
GSP33samkaubh_u:1025: cakṣur api san na lipyate cākṣuṣair aśucyādidarśananimittair ādhyātmikaiḥ pāpadoṣair
GSP33samkaubh_u:1026: bāhyaiś cāśucyādisaṃsaṅgadoṣair ekaḥ saṃs tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1027: loko hy avidyayā svātmany adhyastayā kāmakarmodbhavaṃ duḥkham anubhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1029: yathā rajjuśuktikoṣaragaganeṣu sarparajatodakamalāni na rajjvādīnāṃ svato doṣarūpāṇi santi,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1031: na taddoṣais teṣāṃ lepo viparītabuddhyadhyāsabāhyā hi te /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1032: tathātmani sarvo lokaḥ kriyākārakaphalātmakaṃ vijñānaṃ sarpādisthānīyaṃ viparītamadhyasya tannimittaṃ janmamaraṇādiduḥkham anubhavati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1033: na tv ātmā sarvalokātmāpi san viparītādhyāropanimittena lipyate lokaduḥkhena /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1034: kuto bāhyo rajjvādivad eva viparītabuddhyadhyāsabāhyo hi sa iti // KaUBh_5.11/2,2.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1035: eko vaśī sarvabhūtāntarātmā ekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1036: tam ātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ sukhaṃ śāśvataṃ netareṣām // KaU_5.12/2,2.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1037: kiñ ca sa hi parameśvaraḥ sarvagataḥ svatantra eko na tatsamo 'bhyadhiko vānyo 'sti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1038: vaśī sarvaṃ hy asya jagadvaśe vartate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1040: yata ekam eva sadekarasam ātmānaṃ viśuddhavijñānarūpaṃ nāmarūpādyaśuddhopādhibhedavaśena
GSP33samkaubh_u:1041: bahudhānekaprakāraṃ yaḥ karoti svātmasattāmātreṇācintyaśaktitvāt tam ātmasthaṃ svaśarīrahṛdayākāśe
GSP33samkaubh_u:1046: tam etam īśvaram ātmānaṃ ye nivṛttabāhyavṛttayo 'nupaśyanty ācāryāgamopadeśam anu
GSP33samkaubh_u:1047: sākṣād anubhavanti dhīrā vivekinas teṣāṃ parameśvarabhūtānāṃ śāśvataṃ nityaṃ sukham
GSP33samkaubh_u:1049: netareṣāṃ bāhyāsaktabuddhīnām avivekināṃ svātmabhūtam apy avidyāvyavadhānāt // KaUBh_5.12/2,2.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1050: nityo 'nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1051: tam ātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣaṃ śāntiḥ śāśvatī netareṣām // KaU_5.13/2,2.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1053: cetanaś cetanānāṃ cetayitṝṇāṃ brahmādīnāṃ prāṇinām agninimittam iva dāhakatvam anagnīnām udakādīnām ātmacaitanyanimittam eva cetayitṛtvam anyeṣām
GSP33samkaubh_u:1054: kiñ ca sa sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ kāmināṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ karmānurūpaṃ kāmān karmaphalāni svānugrahanimittāś ca kāmāny eko bahūnām anekeṣāmanāyāsena vidadhāti prayacchatīty etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1055: tām ātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ śāntir uparatiḥ śāśvatī nityā svātmabhūtaiva syān netareṣām anevaṃ vidhānām // KaUBh_5.13/2,1.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1056: tad etad iti manyante 'nirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1057: kathaṃ nu tad vijānīyāṃ kim u bhāti vibhāti vā // KaU_5.14/2,2.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1058: yat tad ātmavijñānasukham anirdeśyaṃ nirdeṣṭum aśakyaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ prākṛtapuruṣavāṅmanasayor agocaram api san nivṛttaiṣaṇā ye brāhmaṇās ta etat pratyakṣam eveti manyante,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1059: kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa tat sukham ahaṃ vijānīyām /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1060: idam ity ātmabuddhiviṣayam āpādayeyaṃ yathā nivṛttaiṣaṇā yatayaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1061: kim u tad bhāti dīpyate prakāśātmakaṃ tad yato 'smadbuddhigocaratvena vibhāti vispaṣṭaṃ dṛśyate kiṃ vā neti // KaUBh_5.14/2,1.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1062: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yam agniḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1063: tam eva bhāntam anu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti // KaU_5.15/2,2.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1064: atrottaram idaṃ bhāti ca vibhāti ceti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1065: katham? na tatra tasmin svātmabhūte brahmaṇi sarvāvabhāsako 'pi sūryo bhāti tad brahma na prakāśayatīty arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1069: kiṃ bahunā, yad idam ādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhāti tat tam eva parameśvaraṃ bhāntaṃ dīpyamānam anubhāty anudīpyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1070: tathā jalolmukādy agnisaṃyogād agniṃ dahantam anudahati na svatas tadvat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1071: tasyaiva bhāsā dīptyā sarvam idaṃ sūryādi vibhati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1072: yata evaṃ tad eva brahma bhāti ca vibhāti ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1073: kāryagatena vividhena bhāsā tasya brahmaṇo bhārūpatvaṃ svato 'vagamyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1074: na hi svato 'vidyamānaṃ bhāsanam anyasya kartuṃ śaktam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1075: ghaṭādīnām anyāvabhāsakatvādarśanād bhārūpāṇāṃ cādityādīnāṃ taddarśanāt // KaUBh_5.15/2,2.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1078: tūlāvadhāraṇenaiva mūlāvadhāraṇaṃ vṛkṣasya yathā kriyate loke,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1079: evaṃ saṃsārakāryavṛkṣāvadhāraṇena tanmūlasya brāhmaṇaḥ svarūpāvadidhārayiṣayeyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī vally ārabhyate --
GSP33samkaubh_u:1081: tad eva śukraṃ tad brahma tad evāmṛtam ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1082: tasmiṃl lokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tad u nātyeti kaścana //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1084: ūrdhvamūla ūrdhvaṃ mūlaṃ yat tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam asyeti so 'yam avyaktādisthāvarāntaḥ saṃsāravṛkṣa ūrdhvamūlaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1087: dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpatvād avasāne ca vṛkṣavad abhāvātmakaḥ kadalīstambhavan niḥsāro 'nekaśatapākhaṇḍabuddhivikalpāspadas
GSP33samkaubh_u:1098: yad asya saṃsāravṛkṣasya mūlaṃ tad eva śukraṃ śubhraṃ śuddhaṃ jyotiṣmac caitanyātmajyotiḥsvabhāvaṃ tad eva brahma sarvamahattvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1099: tad evāmṛtam avināśasvabhāvam ucyate kathyate satyatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1100: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam anṛtam anyadato martyam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1101: tasmin paramārthasatye brahmaṇi lokā gandharvanagaramarīcyudakamāyāsamāḥ paramārthadarśanābhāvāvagamanāḥ śritāśritāḥ sarve samastā utpattisthitilayeṣu
GSP33samkaubh_u:1102: tad u tadbrahma nātyeti nātivartate mṛdādikam iva ghaṭādikāryaṃ kaścana kaścid api vikāraḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1104: yad idaṃ kiṃca jagat sarvaṃ prāṇa ejati niḥsṛtam /
