GSP33samkaubh_u:1105: mahad bhayaṃ vajram udyataṃ ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti // KaU_6.2/2,3.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1107: jagato mūlaṃ tad eva nāsti brahmāsata evedaṃ niḥsṛtam iti tan na /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1108: yad idaṃ kiñ ca yat kiṃ cedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ prāṇe /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1110: tata eva niḥsṛtaṃ nirgataṃ satpracalati niyamena ceṣṭate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1112: mahac ca tad bhayaṃ ca bibhety asmād iti mahadbhayam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1114: yathā vajrodyatakaraṃ svāminam abhimukhībhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛtyā niyamena tac chāsane vartante,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1115: tathedaṃ candrādityagrahanakṣatratārakādilakṣaṇaṃ jagatseśvaraṃ niyamena kṣaṇam apy aviśrāntaṃ vartata ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1116: ya etad viduḥ svātmapravṛttisākṣibhūtam ekaṃ brahmāmṛtā amaraṇadharmāṇāste bhavanti // KaUBh_6.2/2,3.2 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1117: bhayād asyāgnis tapati bhayāt tapati sūryaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1118: bhayād indraś ca vāyuś ca mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ // KaU_6.3/2,3.3 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1119: kathaṃ tadbhayāj jagadvartata ity āha -- bhayād bhītyāsya parameśvarasyāgnis tapati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1121: bhayād indraś ca vāyuś ca mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1122: na hīśvarāṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ samarthānāṃ satāṃ niyantā ced vajrodyatakaravan na syāt svāmibhayabhītānām iva bhṛtyānāṃ niyatā pravṛtir upapadyate
GSP33samkaubh_u:1123: iha ced aśakad boddhuṃ prākśarīrasya visrasaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1124: tataḥ sargeṣu lokeṣu śarīratvāya kalpate // KaU_6.4/2,3.4 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1125: tac ceha jīvann eva ced yady aśakac chaknoti śaktaḥ san jānāty etad bhayakāraṇaṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:1126: brahma boddhum avagantuṃ prak pūrvaṃ śarīrasya visraso 'vasraṃsanāt patanāt saṃsārabandhanād vimucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1129: sṛjyante yeṣu sraṣṭavyāḥ prāṇina iti sargāḥ pṛthivyādayo lokās teṣu sargeṣu lokeṣu śarīratvāya śarīrabhāvāya kalpate samartho bhavati śarīraṃ gṛhṇātīty arthaḥ //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1131: yasmād ihaivātmano darśanam ādarśasthasyeva mukhasya spaṣṭamupapadyate na lokāntareṣu brahmalokād anyatra /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1134: yathādarśe tathātmani yathā svapne tathā pitṛloke /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1135: yathāpsu parīva dadṛśe tathā gandharvaloke chāyātapayor iva brahmaloke // KaU_6.5/2,3.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1137: tathehātmani svabuddhāvādarśavan nirmalībhūtāyāṃ viviktam ātmano darśanaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1139: tathā pitṛloke 'viviktam eva darśanam ātmanaḥ karmaphalopabhogāsaktatvāt /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1140: yathā cāpsv aviviktāvayavam ātmarūpaṃ parīva dadṛśe paridṛśyata iva,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1142: evañ ca lokāntareṣv api śāstraprāmāṇyād avagamyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1145: tasmād ātmadarśanāyehaiva yatnaḥ kartavya ity abhiprāyaḥ // KaUBh_6.5/2,3.5 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1147: pṛthag utpadyamānānāṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // KaU_6.6/2,3.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1148: katham asau boddhavyaḥ kiṃ vā tadavabodhe prayojanam ity ucyate -- indriyāṇāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ
GSP33samkaubh_u:1151: tathā teṣām evendriyāṇām udayāstamayau cotpattipralayau jāgratsvāpnāvasthāpekṣayā nātmanas tāv iti matvā jñātvā vivekato dhīro dhīmān na śocati
GSP33samkaubh_u:1153: tathā ca śrutyantaraṃ “tarati śokam ātmavit” (ChU 7,1.3) iti // KaUBh_6.6/2,3.6 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1154: indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ mano manasaḥ sattvam uttamam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1155: sattvād adhi mahānātmā mahato 'vyaktam uttamam // KaU_6.7/2,3.7 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1156: yasmād ātmana indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāva ukto nāsau bahir adhigantavyo yasmāt pratyagātmā sa sarvasya,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1157: tat katham ity ucyate -- indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ mana ity ādi /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1161: avyaktāt tu paraḥ puruṣo vyāpako 'liṅga eva ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1162: yaṃ jñātvā mucyate jantur amṛtatvaṃ ca gacchati // KaU_6.8/2,3.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1164: vyāpakasyāpy ākāśādeḥ sarvasya kāraṇatvād aliṅgo liṅgyate gamyate yena tal liṅgaṃ budhyādi,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1165: tad avidyamānaṃ yasya so 'yam aliṅga eva ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1167: yaṃ jñātvācāryataḥ śāstrataś ca mucyate jantur avidyādihṛdayagranthibhir jīvann eva,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1169: so 'liṅgaḥ paro 'vyaktāt puruṣa iti pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ // KaUBh_6.8/2,3.8 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1170: na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1171: hṛdā manīṣā manasābhikḷpto ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti // KaU_6.9/2,3.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1172: kathaṃ tarhi tasyāliṅgasya darśanam upapadyata ity ucyate na san dṛśe san darśanaviṣaye na tiṣṭhati pratyagātmano 'sya rūpam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1175: paśyati nopalabhate kaścana kaścid apy enaṃ prakṛtam ātmānam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1176: kathaṃ tarhi taṃ paśyed ity ucyate -- hṛdā hṛtsthayā buddhyā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1177: manīṣā manasaḥ saṅkalpādirūpasyeṣṭe niyantṛtveneti manīṭ tayā manīṣāvikalpayitryā buddhyā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1178: manasā mananarūpeṇa samyag darśanenābhikḷpto 'bhisamarthito 'bhiprakāśita ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1180: tam ātmānaṃ brahmaitad ye vidur amṛtās te bhavanti // KaUBh_6.9/2,3.9 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1182: buddhiś ca na viceṣṭati tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim // KaU_6.10/2,3.10 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1183: sā hṛnmanīṭ kathaṃ prāpyata iti tad artho yoga ucyate -- yadā yasmin kāle svaviṣayebhyo nivartitānyātmany eva pañca jñānāni /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1187: buddhiś cādhyavasāyalakṣaṇā na viceṣṭati svavyāpāreṣu na viceṣṭate na vyāpriyate,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1189: tāṃ yogam iti manyante sthirām indriyadhāraṇām /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1190: apramattas tadā bhavati yogo hi prabhavāpyayau // KaU_6.11/2,3.11 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1191: tām īdṛśīṃ tadavasthāṃ yogam iti manyante viyogam eva santam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1194: sthirām indrayadhāraṇāṃ sthirām acalām indrayadhāraṇāṃ bāhyāntaḥkaraṇānāṃ dhāraṇam ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1195: apramattaḥ pramādavarjitaḥ samādhānaṃ prati nityaṃ yatnavāṃs tadā tasmin kāle,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1198: tasmāt prāg eva buddhyādiceṣṭoparamād apramādo vidhīyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1200: tadānīm eva niraṅkuśam apramattatvam ity ato 'bhidhīyate 'pramattas tadā bhavatīti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1202: yogo hi yasmāt prabhavāpyayāv upajanāpāyadharmaka ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1204: naiva vācā na manasā prāptuṃ śakyo na cakṣuṣā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1205: astīti bruvato 'nyatra kathaṃ tad upalabhyate // KaU_6.12/2,3.12 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1206: buddhyādiceṣṭāviṣayaṃ ced brahmedaṃ tad iti viśeṣato gṛhyeta,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1207: buddhyādyuparame ca grahaṇakāraṇābhāvād anupalabhyamānaṃ nāsty eva brahma /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1208: yad dhi karaṇagocaraṃ tad astīti prasiddhaṃ loke viparītaṃ cāsad iti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1209: ataś cānarthako yogo 'anupalabhyamānatvād vā nāstīty upalabdhavyaṃ brahmety evaṃ prāpta idam ucyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1211: naiva vācā na manasā na cakṣuṣā nānyair apīndriyaiḥ prāptuṃ śakyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1212: tathāpi sarvaviśeṣarahito 'pi jagato mūlam ity avagatatvād asty eva,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1214: tathā hīdaṃ kāryaṃ sūkṣmatāratamyapāramparyeṇānugamyamānaṃ sadbuddhiniṣṭhām evāvagamayati /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1215: yadāpi viṣayapravilāpanena pravilāpyamānā buddhis tadāpi sā satpratyayagarbhaiva vilīyate /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1216: buddhir hi naḥ pramāṇaṃ sadasator yāthātmyāvagame /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1217: mūlaṃ cej jagato na syād asad anvitam evedaṃ kāryam asad ity evaṃ gṛhyeta,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1223: astīti bruvato 'stitvavādina āgamārthānusāriṇaḥ śraddadhānād anyatra nāstikavādini
GSP33samkaubh_u:1224: nāsti jagato mūlam ātmā niranvayam evedaṃ kāryam abhāvāntaṃ pravilīyata iti manyamāne viparītadarśini,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1229: tasmād apohyāsadvādipakṣam āsuram astīty evātmopalabdhavyaḥ satkāryabuddhyādyupādhibhiḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1230: yadā tu tadrahito 'vikriya ātmā kāryaṃ ca kāraṇavyatirekeṇa nāsti “vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam” (ChU 6,1.4) iti śruteḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:1233: tatrāpy ubhayoḥ sopādhikanirupādhikayor astitvatattvabhāvayoḥ -- nirdhāraṇārthā ṣaṣṭhī -- pūrvam astīty evopalabdhasyātmanaḥ satkāryopādhikṛtāstitvapratyayenopalabdhasyety arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1234: paścāt pratyastamitasarvopādhirūpa ātmanas tattvabhāvo viditāviditābhyāmanyo 'dvayasvabhāvo “neti neti” “asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam” (BĀU 3,8.8)
GSP33samkaubh_u:1237: ātmaprakāśanāya pūrvam astīty upalabdhavata ity etat // KaUBh_6.13/2,3.13 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1238: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1239: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute // KaU_6.14/2,3.14 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1240: evaṃ paramārthātmadarśino yadā yasmin kāle sarve kāmāḥ kāmayitavyasyānyasyābhāvāt,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1243: ye 'sya prāk pratibodhād viduṣo hṛdi buddhau śritā āśritāḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1244: buddhir hi kāmānām āśrayo nātmā “kāmaḥ saṅkalpaḥ” (BĀU 1,5.3)
GSP33samkaubh_u:1246: atha tadā martyaḥ prāk prabodhād āsīt sa prabodhottarakālam avidyākāmakarmalakṣaṇasya mṛtyor vināśād amṛto bhavati,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1247: gamanaprayojakasya mṛtyor vinaśād gamanānupapatter atrehaiva pradipanirvāṇavatsarvabandhanopaśamād brahma samaśnute brahmaiva bhavatīty arthaḥ
GSP33samkaubh_u:1249: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty etāvad dhy anuśāsanam // KaU_6.15/2,3.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1250: kadā punaḥ kāmānāṃ mūlato vināśa ity ucyate -- yadā sarve prabhidyante bhedam upayānti
GSP33samkaubh_u:1251: vinaśyanti hṛdayasya buddher iha jīvata eva granthayo granthivad dṛḍhabandhanarūpā
GSP33samkaubh_u:1253: aham idaṃ śarīraṃ mamedaṃ dhanaṃ sukhī duḥkhī cāham ity evam ādilkṣaṇās tadviparītabrahmātmapratyayopajananād
GSP33samkaubh_u:1254: brahmaivāham asmy asaṃsārīti vinaṣṭeṣv avidyāgranthiṣu tannimittāḥ kāmā mūlato vinaśyanti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1255: atha matryo 'mṛto bhavaty etāvad dhy etāvad evaitāvan mātraṃ nādhikam astīty āśaṅkā kartavyā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1256: anuśāsanam anuśiṣṭir upadeśaḥ sarvavedāntānām iti vākyaśeṣaḥ // KaUBh_6.15/2,3.15 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1257: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1258: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavati // KaU_6.16/2,3.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1259: nirastāśeṣaviśeṣavyāpibrahmātmapratipattyā prabhinnasamastāvidyādigranther jīvata eva brahmabhūtasya viduṣo na gatir vidyate “atra brahma samaśnute” (BĀU 4,4.7)
GSP33samkaubh_u:1260: ity uktatvāt “na tasya prāṇā utkāmanti brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti” (BĀU 4,4.6)
GSP33samkaubh_u:1262: ye punar mandabrahmavido vidyāntaraśīlinaś ca brahmalokabhājo ye ca tadviparītāḥ saṃsārabhājaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1264: kiñ cānyad agnividyā pṛṣṭā pratyuktā ca /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1265: tasyāś ca phalaprāptiprakāro vaktavya iti mantrārambhaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1266: tatra -- śataṃ ca śatasaṅkhyākā ekā ca suṣumnā nāma puruṣasya hṛdayād viniḥsṛtā nāḍyaḥ śirāḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1267: tāsāṃ madhye mūrdhānaṃ bhittvābhiniḥsṛtā nirgatā ekā suṣumnā nāma /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1269: tayā nāḍyor dhvam uparyāyan gacchann ādityadvāreṇāmṛtatvam amaraṇadharmatvam āpekṣikam -- “ābhūtasamplavaṃ sthānam amṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate” (ViP
GSP33samkaubh_u:1270: iti smṛteḥ -- brahmaṇā vā saha kālāntareṇa mukhyam amṛtatvam eti bhuktvā bhogān anupamān brahmalokagatān /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1271: viṣvaṅnānāvidhagatayo 'nyā nāḍya utkramaṇe bhavanti saṃsārapratipattyarthā eva bhavantīty arthāḥ // KaUBh_6.16/2,3.16 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1272: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1273: taṃ svāc charīrāt pravṛhen muñjād iveṣīkāṃ dhairyeṇa /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1274: taṃ vidyāc chukram amṛtaṃ taṃ vidyāc chukram amṛtam iti // KaU_6.17/2,3.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1275: idānīṃ sarvavallyarthopasaṃhārārtham āha -- aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ sambandhini hṛdaye san niviṣṭo yathā vyākhyātaḥ,
GSP33samkaubh_u:1276: taṃ svādātmīyāc charīrāt pravṛhed udyacchen niṣkarṣet pṛthak kuryād ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1278: taṃ śarīrān niṣkṛṣṭaṃ cinmātraṃ vidyādvijānīyāc chukraṃ śuddham amṛtaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1279: dvir vacanam upaniṣat parisamāpty artham iti śabdaś ca // KaUBh_6.17/2,3.17 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1280: mṛtyuproktāṃ naciketo 'tha labdhvā vidyām etāṃ yogavidhiṃ ca kṛtsnam /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1281: brahmaprāpto virajo 'bhūd vimṛtyur anyo 'py evaṃ yo vid adhyātmam eva // KaU_6.18/2,3.18 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1282: vidyāstutyartho 'yam ākhyāyikārthopasaṃhāro 'dhunocyate -- mṛtyuproktām etāṃ yathoktāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogavidhiṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ samastaṃ sopakaraṇaṃ saphalam ity etat /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1283: naciketo 'tha varapradānān mṛtyor labdhvā prāpyety arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1284: kim? brahma prāpto 'bhūn mukto 'bhavad ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1285: katham? vidyāprāptyā virajo vigatadharmādharmo vimṛtyur vigatakāmāvidyaś ca san pūrvam ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1286: na kevalaṃ naciketā evānyo 'pi ya evaṃ naciketovad ātmavid adhyātmam eva nirupacaritaṃ pratyak svarūpaṃ prāpya tattvam evety abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1288: tad evam adhyātmam evam uktaprakāreṇa veda vijānātīty evaṃvit so 'pi virajāḥ san brahma prāpya vimṛtyur bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ // KaUBh_6.18/2,3.18
GSP33samkaubh_u:1292: tejasvi nāvadhītam astu mā vidviṣāvahai // KaU_6.19/2,3.19 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1295: śiṣyācāryayoḥ pramādakṛtānyāyena vidyāgrahaṇapratipādananimittadoṣapraśamanārtheyaṃ śāntir ucyate -- saha nāv āvām avatu pālayatu vidyāsvarūpaprakāśanena
GSP33samkaubh_u:1296: kaḥ? sa eva parameśvara upaniṣat prakāśitaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1297: kiñ ca saha nau bhunaktu tatphalaprakāśanena nau pālayatu /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1298: sahaivāvāṃ vidyākṛtaṃ vīryaṃ sāmathryaṃ karavāvahai niṣpādayāvahai /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1299: kiñ ca tejasvi nau tejasvi naurāvayor yad adhītaṃ tat svadhītam astu /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1300: athavā tejasvi nāvāvābhyāṃ yad adhītaṃ tad atīva tejasvi vīryavad astv ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1301: mā vidviṣāvahai śiṣyācāryāv anyonyaṃ pramādakṛtānyāyādhyayanādhyāpanadoṣanimittaṃ dveṣaṃ mā karavāvahai ity arthaḥ /
GSP33samkaubh_u:1302: śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntir iti trir vacanaṃ sarvadoṣopaśamanārtham ity om iti // KaUBh_6.19/2,3.19 //
GSP33samkaubh_u:1303: iti śrīmat paramahaṃsaparivrājakācāryasya śrī govindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyasya śrī śaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau kāṭhakopaniṣadbhāṣyaṃ samāptam //
